author: {'steamid': '76561198108179644', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4763, 'last_played': 1587319154}
review:
This game is a bit old, but still pretty fun. Between the campaign, endless, multiple characters and scenarios, there is hours of play time. The levels are really hard for a single player, but co op is available for friends to cover weaknesses in the individual characters. 

The wiki says Sorceress is the least durable of the 3 characters, but with a good armor set that can be amended. Haven't played well as marksman yet, but he seems to be the hardest to level in the beginning. And the mercenary can be a wall with hp granting traps or armor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089165346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 2256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2133, 'last_played': 1586833072}
review:
[h1]Respuesta corta: [/h1]
Un juego muy muy interesante, me gustó mucho, pero gráficamente envejeció mal.

[h1]Respuesta Extendida: [/h1]
[b]Historia:[/b] Regular, me pareció más una justificación para la existencia del juego, pero no se le llega a extrañar.
[b]Diseño y Gráficos:[/b] Muy Buen diseño de niveles, pero los gráficos no envejecieron para nada bien.
[b]Gameplay:[/b] Muy muy interesante y adictivo, se siente bien saber que puedes ganar un nivel con tu propio estilo.
[b]Música:[/b]  Regular, nada memorable.

[b]Palabras finales:[/b] Un muy buen juego, entretenido y muy interesante, lo recomiendo a cualquiera que quiera probar un Tower Defense. Sería un juego genial si hicieran un remake 4K con un re Skin de los enemigos, héroes y habilidades.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055778112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 4701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4296, 'last_played': 1644009753}
review:
Edit: This review has been updated to reflect the changes until 2020-07-15. With servers up and running, this is an amazing game (and was my biggest complaint, that they were down).

[b]Summary[/b]
Deathtrap is a standalone version of the tower defense game mode of Van Helsing with ok graphics, excellent music and addictive gameplay with three classes of heroes. Game modes are single-player, cooperative (best) and player vs player. Multiplayer is available via online matchmaking server (doesn't quite work anymore, is run by the developers, not Steam) with an automatic fallback to LAN mode.

Amazing addictive game, but developers have abandoned game long ago (try to open the homepage  [url=http://deathtrapthegame.com]http://deathtrapthegame.com[/url]), has some outstanding bugs, Coop / PvP only via LAN possible, matchmaking server are non-functional.

GOG and Steam versions seem to be identical (technical).

[b]Buy / Don't Buy[/b]
- Buy it, if you are a fan of the Orcs Must Die franchise and you are lusting for more (although this is another perspective, but very similar game loop). 
- Buy it, if you like coop gameplay and addicting gameplay mechanics.
Otherwise, don't buy it.

[b]Positive:[/b]
- Outstanding music which gets you really in the mood playing.
- Coop gameplay is top notch.
- included map editor and steam workshop.
- included monster encyclopedia.

[b]Neutral:[/b]
- graphics are a bit dated, but there are still cool effects on the screens, especially magic.
- a bit grindy
- there are some unfair maps, geared to specific classes and skills, but doable.

[b]So-So[/b]
- Online gameplay does not use Steam, but it is at the mercy of the developers / publishers. At the time of the original review, the servers were down, but it seems that they are now up and running.

[b]Negative:[/b]
- Game is abandoned, there are some bugs (like broken achievements, matchmaking server most of the time down) which won't be fixed.


Edit:
Website is on https://neocoregames.com/en/games/deathtrap/overview

author: {'steamid': '76561197991262582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1585886810}
review:
It's ok. I agree with the other reviewer that said it starts out well but becomes rote. 

Pros:
- Pretty nice graphics and performance
- Seems well programmed and is solid and I didn't encounter bugs in my time with it
- Blends action and tower defense (similar to Orcs Must Die)

Cons:
- Lots of grinding
- Not like typical tower defense games in that hardpoints for towers are predetermined by the map; so you don't get to use towers to create pathing 
- I found that it could be too frantic at times, especially on large maps where you had to navigate long distances. There's no action pause and when using the teleporters I think the action still continues while you're on a different interface screen

I would recommend this is if you really liked Orcs Must Die and relish the action part of the game. If you're more into the traditional tower defense part, stick with Defense Grid, Kingdom Rush, or Dungeon Warfare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198839414777', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1585392658}
review:
Очень необычный Tower Defence. Мне, как любителю этого жанра, игра зашла. Уровней около 11, и они сложные. Очень даже. Башни и ловушки классические, но есть некоторые "оригинальные". Атмосфера неплохая. Сюжета почти нету, простое описание некоторых уровней, которые углубляют игрока в лор.  Есть ещё карты от игроков, соревновательные матчи для любителей выяснить, кто азиат, кто читер, а кто нуб. К 
этому добавляется статистика лучших игроков. Это вроде как всё, но есть одно НО. Очень жирное НО: Главное отличие от других представителей - возможность управлять одним из трёх предложенных персонажей. Помимо этого игроку ещё даётся возможность прокачки башен во время битвы (если вы прокачали их вне боя в соответствующем меню) и прокачка персонажа. Различные пассивки, боевые способности, усиливающие как и игрока, так и подчиняемые ему башни. 
Рекомендую игру для фанатов TD и РПГ.

review: Solid tower defender with a unique set of mechanics for its time. The ability to choose a class and support your towers as a hero works well, and the class-based skill trees give some variety to play. The later game can get grindy of you want to aim for perfect but overall it's a good time sink that feels rewarding when you master the skill curve. The dark and gloomy atmosphere fits well in the Hellsing universe, and meshes well with the monsters and maps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056728942', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 6782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 394, 'last_played': 1584827911}
review:
I bought this game on sale a few years ago, and have just gotten around to playing it. I have to say this is a fun game, it is what you get when Diablo and Dungeon Defenders have a baby. It is a mix of Action/RPG and Tower Defense and it is put together impressively well. I have no complaints and I feel that I am getting my money's worth of entertainment. There are three different classes, a melee character (fighter), a caster character (mage), and a physical/poison (hunter), ranged character to choose from. There are many customization options, and the RNG aspect of the game, when it concerns gear makes it random and delightfully unpredictable.

Update: 3-21-2020:

The Sorceress and Mercenary are easy to play, but the Marksman is much more of a challenge to master...

author: {'steamid': '76561198023073191', 'num_games_owned': 6290, 'num_reviews': 629, 'playtime_forever': 3389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1657, 'last_played': 1585587202}
review:
[h1][b]タワーディフェンスがメインでハクスラ要素はおまけと思ったら、ハクスラがメインのタワーディフェンスがおまけだった良くも悪くもパケ詐欺のゲーム[/b][/h1]
何だこのゲームはあ…
ハクスラが迷走気味の昨今では貴重な一本じゃぞい
良くも裏切られた感じなので、期待してなかったぶん個人的には"通してプレイすると"満足できる作品
一周目はもっさりプレイする感じなところもあって、悪くはないけど良くもないって感想だったけど
難易度アンロックされた時に、こんな微妙ゲーをまた二週目からやるの？と思いながらも
騙されたと思ってプレイしてみると、敵のルートやタワー配置など含め周回プレイシステムのバランスにしっかり着眼おいて作ってあり、他のARPGと比べても出来はかなり良い方だと思う
二週目以降でエンドコンテンツに主軸おいて遊ばせるパチモンハクスラはよくあれど
ポイントカツカツな中で二週目から少しずつ戦闘の成長要素（プレイヤーテク／キャラクターそのもの共において）がダイレクトに反映されて化けるゲームとか完全にハクスラじゃねーか！
同社が作るVan helsingシリーズよりクオリティ高いので
みんなもあんなクソゲー買わずにこのゲームだけ買いましょうね
Neocore Gamesが本当に作りたかった、ユーザーに伝えたかったゲームがここにある

[strike]…最初からこれだけ作っとけよ[/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561198008407276', 'num_games_owned': 966, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 2535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2535, 'last_played': 1581537832}
review:
its a fine tower defense.
but it gets extremely repative at higher ranks.
the maps are "okey" at first but will quickly show its poor design.

unlocking towers is relatively fun to do with each n every single one having a requirement to unlock them.
except for the last few that only unlock once you have beaten the game the first time around.
the requirement for them is simply copy pasted for every unlock.

sadly the ballance of the towers will cause it to very quickly lean towards your select few favorites n even then with the limited build slots only the strongest towers will do. making funny strategies or combo's relatively useless.

there are still an abserd amount of glitches n bugs in the game.
especially with multiplayer where pauzing for the host freezes the whole game. but lets your companions kill the waves efortlessly as they dont move an inch.

overall. its fun for a few hours but afterwards its an forgetable experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151859417', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 761, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1580951424}
review: 인크레더블 어드벤쳐 오브 반헬싱과 관계가 많은 게임이네요. 반헬싱으로 보이는 캐릭터가 등장하구요.  밀려오는 몬스터들을 트랩과 타워로 막는 게임입니다. 시작할 때 트랩과 타워를 기본적으로 세울 수 있는 자원을 줍니다. 트랩과 타워들을 설치하고 시작을 누르면 몬스터들이 몰려옵니다. 몬스터들이 지나가는 길은 정해져있기 때문에 길목마다 트랩과 타워를 잘 설치해 줍니다. 그러면 몬스터들이 지나가면서 트랩과 타워에 공격당하여 죽을 때 자원을 조금씩 줍니다. 그러면 이 자원을 모아서 다시 더 트랩과 타워를 설치합니다. 그래픽은 괸찮은 편이구요. 난이도 설정은 3가지로 할 수가 있습니다.  그래픽과 전투효과는 화려한 편입니다. 재미도 있구요. 몬스터들이 밀려드는 동안에도 타워와 트랩을 계속 설치해야 하니까 쉽지만은 않습니다. 기본공격은 타워와 트랩들로 하지만 보조적으로 직접 공격하고 방어해야 할 경우도 있습니다. 그럼 이만.

author: {'steamid': '76561198836059111', 'num_games_owned': 376, 'num_reviews': 454, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1656218589}
review:
懒得喷了，游戏就两点。
1，前排评论说的汉化贴子地址在KEYLOL，要10积分才能查看汉化下载地址，坑。
2，游戏不像是2015年做出来的，主界面一股满满的粗糙感，接了手柄就不能用鼠标了，分辨率最高也只有1080P选项。
现在也是2020年了，建议不要玩这个游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198218844975', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 945, 'last_played': 1581764693}
review:
Игра отличная, особенно исходя из своего жанра "tower defence". Ну конечно же есть в ней пару "но" - это плохая оптимизация, и довольно часто багующие монстры в своих вратах. А так игра тянет на твердую 4 из 5. 
Игру советую к покупке, если любите этот жанр, но все же советую покупать по скидке, чтоб точно не пожалеть. 
И да забыл упомянуть, что в игре присутствует кооп режим и пвп, но их я не испробовал особо т.к. нет друзей которые играли бы в нее, так что если что пишите, возможно сыграем вместе.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970735464', 'num_games_owned': 2915, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 2624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1947, 'last_played': 1670115240}
review: This is the best game in its genre by a long shot - nothing even comes close. If you were to mash up tower defense with Diablo atmosphere and ARPG mechanics this is what you would get. If that sounds good to you then don't hesitate and buy this game already. The worst thing about it is that there has been no sequel five years later. I would buy it in a heartbeat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056406299', 'num_games_owned': 847, 'num_reviews': 457, 'playtime_forever': 2826, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2826, 'last_played': 1579811948}
review:
Oyuna, Sorceress, Mercenary ve Marksman sınıflarından birisini seçerek başlıyoruz. Her sınıf bambaşka özelliklere sahip ve oynanış tarzları birbirlerinden bir hayli farklı. Single player ve co-op olmak üzere iki farklı oyun modunu beğenimize sunan Deathtrap’i, ilk olarak tek kişilik deneyim etmek şart. Casual, Normal, Hard olarak üçe bölünen zorluk seviyeleri, aynı zamanda oyun içerinden toplayacağımız yetenek puanı ve ödülleri de gözle görülür ölçüde arttırıyor. Yetenek puanları ile karakterimizi “Trap” ve de “Skill” kısımlarından geliştiriyoruz. Skill’ler üç tier’e ayrılıyor. Yeni tier’e geçmek için en az 10. seviyeye ulaşmak gerekiyor ve ilginç bir şekilde bir sonraki tier’de gelecek yetenekleri o seviyeye geçmeden göremiyoruz. Karakterimizin özellikleri ya da oyunun genelinden alınacak bonusların karşımıza çıktığı “Skill” kısmında doğru kararlar vermek şart, aksi halde bölümleri “hard” zorluk seviyesinde geçmek bir hayli zor. Trap kısmındaki upgrade’ler ise bence oyunun merkezi konumunda. İçerisine daldığımız haritaların belirli noktalarına serpiştirilmiş tuzaklar bulunuyor. Bu da demek oluyor ki öyle istediğimiz yere tuzak yerleştirmek diye bir şey söz konusu değil. O yüzden hemen her türlü tuzağı upgrade etmemiz gerekiyor. Şahsen, her tuzağın upgrade’e açılan üç özelliğinden en kritik olanını seçerek işe başladım ve çok faydasını gördüm. Yani tuzaklara yaptığımız upgrade, oyuyun içerisinde kendilerine fazladan “essence” puanı harcayarak geliştirebilmemiz anlamına geliyor. Hani bölüm sonunda upgrade ettim, sonra hep öyle kaldı diye bir şey de yok!

Essence dedik orada bir duralım. Deathtrap’nın kaynak birimi essence. Bölümler içerisinde ardı ardına gelen her yaratık dalgasından sonra topluca kazandığımız bu kaynak, aynı zamanda öldürdüğümüz düşman birimlerinden de geliyor. Bir yandan düşmanlara kendimiz müdahale ediyorken, bir yandan da kazancımızı takip edip, hemen ilgili bina ya da upgrade’i yapmamız gerekiyor. En fazla 20 yaratığın kaçmasına izin veren bölümlerde, harici olarak bonus eşyaya kavuşmamıza olanak sunan anahtar taşıyan yaratıklar da bulunuyor. Bu arkadaşlar tabii ki haritanın en ucra köşesinden bize el sallıyor ve genelde çok miktarda bulunuyorlar. Kim bilir hangisinde anahtar… Deathtrap iyi; ben çok beğendim. Hiçbir Tower Defense oyununu bu kadar oynayacağımı düşünmemiştim ama fena yapıştım.

review: Won't lie, I played this a few years ago and I might say this is right under Dungeon Defenders 1 in the best tower defense games. I like the level creation system. It's way better than Dungeon Defender's system. There is a few issues. No ability to divert waves, game feels like a repeat a little through the story, etc. If you would like to know whether to buy Dungeon Defenders or Deathtrap, see my Dungeon Defenders review, it will help. But, overall, i recommend both Dungeon Defenders and Deathtrap. Buy it, it's only 20 bucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198192355475', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 400, 'last_played': 1576518760}
review:
Very fun tower defence mixed with Diablo-esque movement and abilities, pretty simple to grasp a characters pro's and cons. Only complaint is that boss mobs are too realistic sometimes, (Some of them literally swag-walk past you and won't stop for a hug and/or spell to the face.) But others will happily sit hitting you for hours if you stand in front of them as if they are fuelled with a desire for deep revenge.)

Multiplayer is pretty good, though I am yet to grasp how Essence is distributed in this setting yet (I feel like it is scaled automatically for 3 people at minimum, however it is not impossible and the challenge is pretty fun.

Tried to play entirely in Hard mode from the start, found a block when Flying monsters got introduced, then returned and after 2 attempts achieved the three stars, I got hard mode complete in tier 1 on the first 5 Chapters after around 6 hours, definitely not a game to play for a full day as you might get frustrated, but certainly one of those games worth coming back to often! 

9/10 in my books, from what I see so far I would have loved a little bit more narrative, but otherwise a charming game that can frustrate and entertain for a good amount of time both alone or with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069623529', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1576170509}

author: {'steamid': '76561198000262994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1692375416}
review:
So far this has been a nice surprise!  Tower defense with a nice mix of ARPG. 

The traps are fun when you get a good mix of effects working together and the character skills feel like they have a real impact on the action.  Both the traps and characters have numerous skills, equipment aguments, and upgrade paths you can play with and min-max to your hearts content. If you feel like you made a mistake with a upgrade you can also refund the stated points for some gold so never fear!

The menu is simple and easy to follow, which may seem silly to mention but in alot of ARPG type games the UI gets cluttered and obnoxious to sort though. Although the level selection could use a list system to help you more easily remember your favorite maps and which areas you have finished some challenged from a glance.

As of now I have just scratched the surface with Deathtrap and look forward to unlocking more missions and upgrades!  The devs have put a ton of love into the replay value and it would be a shame to put it to waste!

review:
以外とおもろい。
198円の割引で買ったので期待はしてなくセール来てるやつでマルチプレイ可能なやつないかなーって適当に買ったが、やり込み要素が高く頭を使ってクリアする感じが面白い最初の方は脳死だが。

author: {'steamid': '76561198847372430', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1577032404}
review:
垃圾連線品質= =
不是主持的人一堆殘影 ，還閃退結果打過的一場不算
浪費老子時間的破遊戲
打單人是還行 論連線洗洗睡吧
-------------------------------------------
玩了40小時 做點簡評
這遊戲平衡就是用腳做的
戰士她媽屌的鬼一樣
法師也挺強的
我練的弓箭手我實話實說，打到後期廢到出水。
補魔的部分
平常打怪不會補半滴，一定得繞出去離怪遠點隱身了才能補，戰士和法師基本沒有浩魔困擾，但弓箭手就是常常打沒幾發就魔力枯竭(即便我已經疊到300多魔)，遇到大群怪交戰我只能說準備吃屎。

AOE部分
  弓箭手本身AOE技能就少得可憐，唯一最有用的火箭雨強力清怪技能CD長到你不敢想像。你說AOE弓箭手靠平A?抱歉靠普攻即便我普攻三技能全滿也是癢到不行，小怪防低的免強能撐，大怪、坦怪直接掰。

  穿透箭這技能還得看臉，臉好(點滿75%)才穿的過去變成AOE，臉差就是好幾發低傷單體技能，打硬怪更是他媽直接變成廢技。

  唯一強力技能火箭雨強度是可以，但是他CD長到你會哭，基本可以說射完你就萎了，一樣遇到大怪海交戰，別說你想靠這技能吃飯啦，你連撐過這波都是大問題

增傷部分
  弓箭手唯一得優勢似乎是增傷，不管是持續增傷的技能提升30%，還是殺敵疊增傷可以疊到50%，又或是解除隱身增傷50%5秒，看似似乎是屌的一匹，配三轉單體雷光箭或是冰箭不就見一隻殺一隻嗎?
  但是抱歉，我不曉得是這遊戲的設計有BUG還是甚麼東西，我把全增傷都點滿，即便我刻意隱身然後解除，或是打一波小怪交戰疊傷害，打出來的傷害通通都跟沒觸發這些增傷的時候一樣，根本沒有增傷，

結論
  那增傷根本就沒有套用的情況下，不能AOE，不能控場，補魔又有困擾的'弓箭手你覺得它的定位是甚麼呢?我也不再多說，留給各想玩的人好好想想吧!!

review:
Tower Defense leaves behind a more cartoonish character for this gritty and darker tower defense game that is a lot more than just trying to plot out the traps and upgrades, but also manage the RPG elements similar to Diablo that allow you to pick up where your traps leave off.

A lot of fun! I highly recommend it.

review: I wish I could give this three stars or a "meh" instead of the stupid thumbs up thumbs down. I like tower defense games and the enjoyment of also combating the enemies so if you can pick this game up for few bucks then do so. However I much prefer the combat of sanctum and orcs must die over this game. I also like to place towers where I choose and not be dictated by the developer to this extent. Yes you can pick from choice of a few towers as you progress in the game, but you are much more restricted than other similar games.

review:
Very good game overall. Similar to sanctum, but in a different lore, and top-down view instead of first-person.

Pros:
 - replayability: 3 different classes, scenario & endless mode, also the map editor is included by default - these guys don't want to rob your money with DLCs
 - nice graphics and voice acting
 - plays well on linux

Cons:

review: Love this game! It's a great blend of tower defense and hack & slash RPG, and I feel it does justice to both genres. Plenty of replayability here with multiple campaign runs, lots of skills/traps to unlock, and hundreds of community made levels. Multiplayer is dead, but you could always grab an extra copy for a friend when it goes on sale. Highly recommended for fans of tower defense and hack & slash games. If you're into both genres, it's a clear winner. [url]https://youtu.be/9Z5lCJxKwnk[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198284484069', 'num_games_owned': 769, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 1879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1877, 'last_played': 1606651760}
review: 融入了《暗黑2》RPG元素的塔防游戏，将角色培养和塔防结合到了一起，角色有职业，有技能树，能加点，有流派，可以刷装备，也有什么橙装蓝装之类的可以装备，想像一下把你暗黑中的角色放入一个塔防游戏中让他和塔一起防守，就是这种感觉，非常新颖的玩法，刷怪爽到飞起，还能联机合作，非常好玩的一款游戏，可惜就是没啥名气，被埋没了，可惜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198123331738', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 2287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 610, 'last_played': 1576570961}
review:
Неплохой TD. башни, ловушки и герой(ведьма, воин или стрелок на выбор).
Идут мобы ты их мочишь, постепенно прокачивая умения свои и ловушек с башнями.
Можно одному, можно с друзьями, можно создавать карты.

Нельзя переименовывать героя! Отстой!

author: {'steamid': '76561198054673814', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 819, 'last_played': 1573879950}
review:
Magnífico juego, combina ARPGs tipo Diablo con Tower Defense. Básicamente Van Hellsing se toma unas vacaciones y se pone en plan "¡no podrás pasar!" en otra dimensión.
Ideal para aquellos que quieran darse el salto al genero del Tower Defense teniendo experiencia en ARPGs. Eso sí, recomendable su compra con descuento. 

Antes que nada decir que la campaña son 13 escenarios pero cuando acabas te dan mas escenarios creados por jugadores, algunos francamente muy buenos.

- Gráficos: clasicos y preciositas, no envejecen. Es perfecto para jugarlo con cualquier equipo.
- Jugabilidad: Inmejorable
- Sonido: Bueno, los efectos sonoros son correctos aunque habría agradecido un par de canciones mas, pues al final se te hacen las que hay repetitivas.
- Dificultad: la puedes ajustar y con interesantes opciones aunque hay mapas en los que el juego adolece de picos de dificultad.

De momento habiendo acabado la campaña con el tirador en NORMAL y NORMAL+ me ha sorprendido por el grado de detalle en la build pudiendo personalizar tu personaje en equipo y talentos (estos dividiéndose en 3 ramas: combate, trampas y globales, estos a su vez pueden ser talentos activos o pasivos).

A su vez puedes elegir entre tirador, guerrero y hechicera.

Me ha sorprendido el juego, con alguna canción mas sería perfecto.

Hidden Gem.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998658899', 'num_games_owned': 1017, 'num_reviews': 870, 'playtime_forever': 1171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1573623218}
review:
范海辛系列游戏的一个塔防游戏分支，可玩性非常高。
炮塔种类多，可以升级各种各样功能，功能齐全。
玩家可以从战士、枪手以及法师选取3个职业，在建塔的同时也能攻击敌人，当然也会受到敌人的攻击。
某些地图有野怪，只能单挑不能借助炮台（走远了就回去原地了）。
有装备机制，完成地图后获得资金可以购买装备，也可以升级炮台。
后期还挺难的，比较考验炮台的种类分布和资源倾向。

author: {'steamid': '76561198001062406', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1823, 'last_played': 1614740581}
review: A highly enjoyable hybrid of Tower Defense and ARPGs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006217347', 'num_games_owned': 1157, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 771, 'last_played': 1573110324}
review:
This is a very average aRPG/tower defence hybrid.

+ Good voice acting.
+ Some decent mechanics.
+ Lots of upgrades to unlock.
+ Some replayability in the form of challenges, secondary objectives, scenarios and endless mode.

- The game is completely dead, there are only a couple of dozen players worldwide, all attempts at coop failed.
- Dated visuals.
- Some achievements don't work.
- Very few maps.
- Custom maps don't give items, XP or cash.
- Only 3 heroes.
- Heroes are unbalanced.
- Traps are shared between heroes but you have to unlock them separately.
- Only maximum of 2x map speed increase.
- Enemy path cannot be managed like it can be in Defence Grid or Xmorph.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354021776', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1572698094}
review:
Challenging and very well balanced tower defense game.

PROS
* Lots of traps and upgrades, i liked the customisations available.
* Replayable with higher levels of difficulty providing a good challenge.
* Variety in the levels and creatures attacking.
* Shop is not pay to win, and weapon generation matches character level.

CONS
* I disliked the graphics because the colours are all too grey, hard to distinguish enemies and attacks (eg electrical attacks are hardly visible sparks).
* Very weak story, voice acting is repetitive after a while, could have had much better dialogue.
* Levels are linear and easy to predict/defend. Would be nice if there was a random spawning option, or maybe that's the later stages i didn't get to.
* Default key mapping is horrible. TIP: remap character movement to WASD. Use keyboard for character movement and spells, plus mouse for aiming and attacking. Spells can't be re-assigned mid-game, need to pick top 4 before starting a level. There is a lot of clicking for attacks :(

SPOILER TIPS:
[spoiler] * Place traps in the middle path and near the gate makes the game easier.
* For larger maps with lots of enemy spawn points, place enough (most) traps on one half of map so that you can focus on attacking on the other. This saves you running back and forwards.
* Cheat - collect equipment that has % chance of finding magical items even if they are weak. Put these in your character inventory (C) on the mid-right side. Once you are in the final wave, and the boss is close to dying, quickly press C and right click on each item to equip it. This allows you to boost the good equipment found in chests by >30% once the boss dies. [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198996211862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 997, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1589109770}

Mage, marksman ya da warrior olarak oynanabiliyor, casual seviyesi çok kolay olmakla birlikte ilerleyen aşamalarda sizi zorlamaya başlıyor, Van Helsing oyunları ile birlikte çok ucuza almıştım, fırsat çıktığında alınabilir, türü sevenlere kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034168703', 'num_games_owned': 3339, 'num_reviews': 317, 'playtime_forever': 1788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1773, 'last_played': 1587166013}
review:
Довольно интересный Tower Defense.
- 3 разных класса/персонажа.
- Довольно много разнообразных башен с разными эффектами(стрелковые, магические, напольные, призывающие монстров).
- Прокачка персонажа и его скилов.
- Прокачка пассивных умений башен и возможностей во время игры.
- На некоторых картах можно встретить дополнительных монстров для доп лута.
- Можно проходить в коопе.
- Есть редактор карт.

Единственный минус то что не возможно поиграть кооп в кастомную карту.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998887445', 'num_games_owned': 1095, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1565625154}
review:
I gotta admit that I found Van Helsing games pretty meh. Spamming a coupla buttons and left mouse at vast numbers of samey enemies didn't do it for me. Surprisingly, this game actually took that, added some strategy, and now it's fun since there's a lot more to do.
The game is pretty much abandoned; don't expect updates or DLC despite the hints towards them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032442774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 2904, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1391, 'last_played': 1566085246}
review:
Jeu sympa pour ceux qui aiment les tower defense.
Avec un systeme de competence et d'améliorations, le joueur a le choix de s'orienter vers du 99% tower defense, ou bien 50% tower defense et 50% hack&slash.

Bien fait graphiquement, animations sympa. Ceux qui ont aimé les petits jeux de tower defense dans le jeu "Van halsing", vous allez adorer, c'est la même chose mais en 10 fois mieux et plus complet.

Le gros point faible du jeu c'est que les emplacements des pièges sont prédéterminés, ca limite le coté "fun" et la rejouabilité des niveaux.

author: {'steamid': '76561198440309009', 'num_games_owned': 795, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 1799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1731, 'last_played': 1565215528}
review:
Deathtrap, a Tower Defense version of The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing gameplay wise, by the same maker.

There is not much story, just an Intro and an Outro, after 13 stages. After that you can either repeat these 13 stages in 3 harder difficulties, (play scenarios, endless mode (you have for both finish "Story" first), or fire up the editor make your own lvls, or download lvls from the workshop.

You can choose between 3 classes and if i had to rank them: Sorceress >  Marksman > Mercenary.
Unfortunately it's only possible to use 6 skills activly out of 9 or 12(?)

25 Traps to choose from, which is kinda lame that the 3 classes ain't had unique and special traps, which makes to replay the game boring and uninteresting.

The progress is rather slow-passed, some enemies are getting stuck at the gates and then you have to search them,....

Overall a smart idea, mix Tower Defense with Diablo-like.

Because of repetition and monotony, i'll stay with an "Meh"

review:
It's like the original Diablo Game, with floor traps and traffic patterns. The blend of tower defense, rpg style leveling, and gear upgrades is amazing. I just wish there were more like this! Also has a phenomenal co-op mode that's so enjoyable, it makes it difficult to go back to single player mode.

Only ask would be for additional maps. I want a Deathtrap 2!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994196106', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1194, 'last_played': 1573345235}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970550187', 'num_games_owned': 773, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1563544373}
review:
I've had this game for the past 4 years and had not played it. My mistake. Deathtrap is amazing. It is a near-perfect blend of action RPG and Tower defense. In it we control a character of on of three basic archetypes. In typical ARPG fashion, we can attack with our character, level up, find random loot, pick our skills and otherwise customize our play style.

Along with fighting the monsters ARPG-style, we also build, upgrade and tactically modify traps on the fly, as well as between waves. There are some quests per level that add a frantic, fun level of tension, as you are trying to complete these quests while defending your Ink Gate. Tense and fun. Push your luck, and try risky quests for better random loot or craft you own gear between maps. Each level is replayable which extends the game play time and adds to the fun in trying different characters, or the same character on the same level repeatedly.

No doubt, this is NeoCore's best, most polished game. Well worth playing if you enjoy ARPGs and/or TD games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164207640', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1570275654}
review:
Same assets, same game play, same items, same traps, same music, same universe, same monsters, same dveloper BUT MOST importantly same FUN with Incredible Adventures of Van Hellsing (actually same with minigame in it). 
I did really like Incredible Adventures of Van Hellsing series, I highly recommended Final Cut version (all 1st-2nd-3rd games in one long game) Sad to there is no more it.
Game play is still fun but actually i love Van Hellsing mostly interactions and dialogues between Main Char and Lady Katarina.
I wish there was a same kind of companion or pet like that.
Game have a DLC button but there is no DLC, possibly developers abondened game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198904806596', 'num_games_owned': 509, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 1912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1912, 'last_played': 1562570384}
review: 这是一款十分硬核十分经典的西方塔防游戏，算是塔防类游戏的先祖了。类型类似于逆战的塔防战，是RPG加陷阱，刚开始玩的新手应该是人物的作用大一些，然后玩到后面的关卡就主要是制造的陷阱的作用了，陷阱也分几个类型，不同的类型不同特点，玩家可以通过不同的通关，然后来升级自己的陷阱，然后系统默认的是鼠标左键移动，类似于LOL那种，我个人不太习惯就设置成的WASD，由于玩其他MOBA游戏比较擅长远程poke，所以这个游戏也是选择的神枪手，游戏还是挺丰富的，满分。

author: {'steamid': '76561198121805690', 'num_games_owned': 663, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 816, 'last_played': 1617083489}

author: {'steamid': '76561198057164443', 'num_games_owned': 288, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 7844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4316, 'last_played': 1588598527}
review:
[h1][b]Schönes Tower-Defense-Spiel im Fantasy-Bereich[/b][/h1]

[i]Deathrap[/i] ist ein schön designtes Tower-Defense-Spiel im Fantasy-Bereich, das mit unterschiedlichen Charakteren, einer Vielzahl von ‚Türmen‘ (hier traps = Fallen) und massig Monstern auf abwechslungsreichen Karten aufwartet.
Ursprünglich ein Mini-Spiel innerhalb des Action-Rollenspiels [i]The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing[/i] wurde es als eigenständiges Spiel ausgekoppelt und zählt zweifellos zur oberen Riege der Tower-Defense-Spiele. Diverse kleine Macken trüben allerdings den Spielspaß.

[b]Zur Einzelkritik:[/b]

[i][u]Steuerung/ Bewegung[/u][/i]
Standard-Maussteuerung: Flüssige Bewegung des Charakters; ganz selten kommt es zu kleinen Verhaklern oder man bleibt mal kurz an einer Ecke hängen.

[i][u]Grafik[/u][/i]
Nicht der letzte Schrei, dadurch aber auch auf älteren Rechnern noch gut spielbar. Die Fantasy-Atmosphäre ist gut – teilweise sogar recht stilsicher – umgesetzt, wobei die Hintergründe (inklusive Bodentexturen) durch das Layout der Karten weitgehend kaschiert werden.

[i][u]Musik/ Sound[/u][/i]
Die Musik fügt sich passend in das Gesamtkonzept ein und verstärkt die Atmosphäre ohne dabei aufdringlich zu wirken. Die Soundeffekte sind ebenfalls stimmig, egal ob Monstergrummeln oder Blitzschlaggeräusch, und treffen den richtigen Ton.

[i][u]Spielprinzip / Charaktere[/u][/i]
Klassisches Tower-Defense mit Monstern, die sich auf einer oder mehreren festgelegten Routen bewegen, die vom Spieler mit Fallen gespickt werden können, um die Monster am Erreichen ihres Ziels (1-3 Portale) zu hindern.

+ drei verschiedene Spielmodi (Kampagne, Szenario, Last Stand)
+ da die Monster sich auf festen Routen bewegen, müssen keine speziellen Mauern errichtet werden und man kann sich auf die Fallen konzentrieren
+ große Zahl unterschiedlicher Fallen, die sich in 5 Kategorien aufteilen. Jede Falle verfügt über bestimmte Stärken und Schwächen, was zum Ausprobieren einlädt und unterschiedliche Strategien ermöglicht
+ drei unterschiedliche Charaktere (Jäger, Hexerin, Söldner), die sich auch wirklich unterschiedlich spielen und über einen eigenen, ausgeprägten Fähigkeitenbaum verfügen

- im Solo-Modus kann einzig die Hexerin ihre Stärken sinnvoll ausspielen; der Söldner kann immer nur eine Route verteidigen und wird als Tank im Nahkampf gebunden, sodass er nicht schnell genug reagieren kann und auch der Jäger entfaltet seine volle Stärke erst im Koop, wenn ein anderer Spieler die Aufmerksamkeit der Gegner auf sich lenken kann
- wie in fast allen Tower-Defense-Spielen ist das Verhältnis von Ressourcen (hier: Essenz) und Gegnern teilweise lächerlich unausgewogen (zu wenig Essenz, zu viele Monster); auch ‚Deathtrap‘ ist zu mindestens zwei Dritteln eigentlich ein Player-Defense-Spiel
- alle Spielmodi finden im Wesentlichen auf denselben 13 Karten statt; die Fallenpunkte ändern sich zwar je nach Modus, doch wäre hier mehr Abwechslung wünschenswert

[i][u]Allgemeines[/u][/i]
- sehr selten treten Abstürze nach Abschluss einer Mission auf, wodurch der erzielte Fortschritt nicht gespeichert wird
- einige Errungenschaften sind seit einem Patch defekt und lassen sich nicht mehr freischalten
- das Entwicklerteam reagiert nicht auf Anfragen und scheint die Unterstützung des Spiels eingestellt zu haben

[b]Fazit: Wer ein gutes Tower-Defense-Spiel sucht, kommt um ‚Deathrap‘ nicht herum. Wer solche Spiele mag, kann bei einer der zahlreichen Steam-Rabattschlachten bedenkenlos zugreifen. Einige kleinere Schwächen verhindern das Prädikat ‚sehr gut‘, weshalb unterm Strich eine glatte 2,0 steht.[/b]

review:
나쁘지 않은 구성. 솔직히 말하면 흔한 타워디펜스 게임. 하지만 흔하다는 건 뭔가? 대중들에게 먹히는 게임들이라는 것!
평범한 타워디펜스 게임에 RPG요소를 부여했지만 캐릭터는 그저 거들뿐(진짜 거들기만한다..) 앞으로도 이런 타워 디펜스 게임이 나왔으면 한다.

review:
Неплохая игра по вселенной Ван Хельсинга, отлично сочетает в себе жанры РПГ и ТД. 
Однако из-за жанра ТД довольно однообразная, поэтому не каждому зайдёт, также из-за этого тяжело играть заплывом. Минусом также является большое количества гринда как опыта, так и золота.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002557842', 'num_games_owned': 1103, 'num_reviews': 283, 'playtime_forever': 1186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1562757007}
review:
Es una curiosa mezcla entre tower defense y ARPG. Y funciona. Pero el problema viene cuando lo terminas (son 13 niveles, unas 6-7 horas. La falta de flexibilidad que tiene el juego (escaso árbol de habilidades, uso creativo de las trampas, poco interés de las builds) hace que no tenga demasiado interés rejugar los mismo mapas con mayor dificultad. Vale la pena una segunda rejugada pero no una tercera. La dificultad es basante elevada y las carencias del juego se hacen aún más palpables. Tampoco ayuda que los niveles tengan un diseño bastante simplón.

Buen concepto, pero pobre si miras ambas partes del juego por separado. Es uno de ésos casos en que una secuela/DLC ampliando la base del juego lo haría cojonudo, pero no tiene pinta que vaya a pasar.

Sólo para fans de los TD, recomendado a bajo precio.

review: A nice surprise for sure. I happen to enjoy TD games but this one is like a TD, Diablo, and LOL had an odd child that you can't help but pay attention to. Odd combination and really explaining it would make this really long. I'd suggest as low priced as it is just give it a go.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997615915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 1496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1681150449}
review:
In short: Small action tower defence game that is really enjoyable. Greatly mixed with rpg elements and tower buidling, it offers a lot of replayability thanks to different difficulties/quests/gamemodes and multiple characters available.
Custom maps adding a fair share of additional challenges. If you enjoy tower defence get it! Haven't try the coop or versus. - 20€ is a tad too much tho, I would recommend it in sales.

(+):
* Does not drag for too long - quick game for quick access to fun
* RPG elements and all the upgrades/items available
* Mutliple characters with their different gameplay
* I like tower defence so yeah I'm bias 

(-):
* Quite grindy and slow progression after few hours despite the quick start

author: {'steamid': '76561198038181537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1013, 'last_played': 1690741720}
review:
A Tower Defense és RPG zseniális egyvelege.

Pro:
+ Egyedi látványvilág / Hangulat
+ Addiktív 
+ Rengeteg csapda és képesség
+ Co-op
+ Zene,Hangok
+ Pályaszerkesztő
+ Többszöri újrajátszhatóság

Contra:
- Kevés zene
- Fix csapda helyek


9.7 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198064792431', 'num_games_owned': 775, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 1510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1372, 'last_played': 1609045322}
review: Si eres amante del género Tower Defense 100% recomendado, juegazo muy divertido con sistema de progresión RPG equipamiento, loot, estadísticas y un montón de habilidades. No hay nadie para jugar online, pero solo lo he disfrutado mucho, casi 23h registradas según steam, también me lo pasé completo en la cuenta de mi novia (pero como queria los logros en mi cuenta, por eso volví a hacerlo) xD sin duda de mis favoritos y suele ponerse a buen precio con rebajas, si puedes comprarlo para jugar con amigos seguro que mejora la diversión a niveles divertidísimos. Hya 3 clases jugables muy diferentes cada uno con sus especialidades y su estilo de juego. La historia sigue en la línea de sus otros juegos, de Van Helsing, creo que en este juego intentan explicar el lio que tiene montado el mundo de tinta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123276206', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 18657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8301, 'last_played': 1636817678}
review:
This game was part of the Van Helsing bundle I bought. I'd never played a tower defense game, mainly RPG games but I really enjoy this game while leveling and getting through the 4 tiers. 
- The game is easy to learn, you have a skill tree for your character and a skill tree for your traps. You can swap points around all you want at the cost of some gold which you'll get plenty of. You can craft items which is pretty straight forward too.
- The first 2 tiers are pretty easy, tier 3 and 4 get a bit more challenging but not impossible to do. If it gets too difficult on tier 3/4 you can always do 1 or 2 runs of the first level on endless mode to give you a lot of extra levels.
- Maybe in the past this was different but getting a party for multiplayer modes is close to impossible so consider this a solo game. Fortunately the main game was designed for solo so it doesn't affect that part.

If you are a hardcore gamer that always aims to beat the hardest tiers, nightmare modes etc then you'll probably be bored with this game in no time. If you are a casual gamer I think you will enjoy this game at least while getting to max level. It's definately worth the 2 bucks it's on sale for at the moment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137855251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 35880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6038, 'last_played': 1661998424}
review:
Скучноватый и необычный tower defense, ни больше ни меньше.

Необычны данные башенки тем, что оборонительные сооружения можно строить только на специальных ячейках и при чем для каждой ячейки своя категория сооружений. Помимо стандартных пушек, которые поджигают или замедляют противника, есть так называемые ловушки с призывом боевых существ. Враги не атакуют башни, но атакуют боевых существ.

Защищать контрольную точку нужно не только с помощью оборонительных сооружений, но и при помощи героя, которых на выбор целых три: 1) воин - который по большей части как танк на легких уровнях; 2) ведьма – обладает хорошим контролем, но в одиночку проходить за нее сложно и 3) парень с двумя арбалетами – непонятный для меня герой, у которого слабый урон и единственный его плюс, это возможность за счет талантов набрать большую скидку на постройку и улучшение оборонительных сооружений.

Сами уровни не вызывают никакого интереса, даже в редакторе карт особо ничего интересно не сделать. Вероятнее всего вся проблема именно в постройке башен только на ячейках. Нужно свободное размещение построек, тогда играть станет хоть и немного, но интереснее.

Изредка захожу, чтобы немного пофармить экипировку для героев. Мультиплеер кстати мертв. За месяц нашлась одна игра с таким же новеньким, как и я.

Отзыв ставлю положительный, потому что Deathtrap на рынке жанра tower defense выделяется и поиграть в нее можно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104671345', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 739, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 739, 'last_played': 1561276179}
review:
[b] Oyunumuz bir tower defense yani kule savunma oyunu.Hepiniz zamanında internet üzerinden böyle oyunlar oynamışsınızdır ( Kingdom Rush gibi).Ancak bu oyundaki önemli 2 detay var.
1-Oyunumuz Van Helsing oyununu yapan yapımcılar tarafından yapılmış ve oyunun içinde V.H(Van Helsing)'deki bir çok yaratığı görebiliyorsunuz.Yine aynı şekilde V.H oyununda da bu oyunun küçük bir simülasyonunu görebiliyor ve oynayabiliyorsunuz.
V.H 1 de bu küçük simülasyon şeklinde olsa da V.H 2 de küçüklükten biraz çıkmış diyebilirim :) 
Oyun yapımcıları 2 oyunu birbirleriyle ilişkilendirmişler gibi.Bİr oyunda diğer oyunun  kule tasarımlarını kullanmışlar.Diğer oyunda ise V.H deki yaratıklar kullanılmış.Anlayacağınız bir oyun oynayarak diğer oyunu da deneyimlemiş oluyorsunuz.
2-Gelelim diğer özelliğe.Oyunda bir karakterimiz var ve bu karakter oyun içinde hareket ettirilebiliyor skill kullanabiliyor,ateş edebiliyor.Yani itemlerine + basılabilen skilleri artan bir karakterimiz var.Bu da oyunun eğlencesini arttırıyor ve monotonluğunu öldürüyor.
NOT: Oyunda V.H deki karakterimiz var.Ben büyücü oynadım daha iyi vuruşlara sahipti ancak isteyenler için Çift Pistol'de var ;) İyi oyunlar dilerim oyun gayet güzel tavsiye ederim. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198426326499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 3650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1531, 'last_played': 1582422452}
review:
让人眼前一亮的塔防+角色养成类游戏，3D效果也不错，对电脑配置要求很低（反正我这个08年淘汰的老爷机也能运行就是有点卡），如何在有限的资源下通关这是玩这款游戏需要考虑的问题。
整个地图通关一遍后，第二遍就感觉难道在增大了，要想通关第二遍，要嘛依靠操作和脑子通过，要嘛只能回到以前的关卡刷刷刷把角色练上去，由于我没能力所以只能刷刷刷，然后就无感了。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561197988281569', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 357, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1560487527}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024228149', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 2914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1444, 'last_played': 1617825101}
review:
Upside: well made, fast paced, very few bugs. The game runs smooth especially since it's a little old, but the graphics are still good. Decent playtime and progression feels fluent enough (do level 1 endless mode if you feel stuck/ are bired leveling up). The mechanics are great and you can use your own playstyle for both towers used and hero leveling (no one skill/ tower is 20x better than another, although some clearly stand out and are preferable).
  
And some downsides: old game, so the community is virtually gone. Getting in a party with someone to play a co-op is pretty hard; getting to play a versus mode is virtually inexistent (at least I never got to try it although I have 24h playing); the connection to other players is weird (some weird coding from the devs makes it so that even if you see a game, you can't connect to it). And finally when you do connect, the players kick you out of the party, are afk, or don't know English. You will find a few lone wanderers here and there which don't kick you out and you can play, but this doesn't mean they know English. Most posts on online forums are from years ago and many are not even relevant anymore since the game changed after multiple patches. The game's wiki page is kinda empty and lackluster (which indicates it didn't have a huge community even in its prime days). The crafting feels "off": even at max level if you wanna build an item, the RNG loot element of the game and crafting assures that you should create that item a lot of times (5-20x depending on what stats you're looking for) if you really want some specific stats. Building a high quality and high level item generally gives you 5 random stats. So you're essentially "rolling a dice 5 times" when you're trying to build that item with some specific points in mind. The main problem with this is that even at max level there is no consistent way of gaining mats quickly, so you have quite a bit of grinding to do. The RNG part assures you that the best way to get items is to keep grinding maps for items, mats and gold, keep checking the shop (it sometimes sells you item schemas or even legendaries), and keep trying to build an item. The bright side is that some maps give more chests than others, so there are some specific farming spots that are better than others.
  
8/10 in its prime.
7/10 now that very few people still play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998483645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1693018892}
review:
The best tower defence game I've ever played.

Like many TD games these days, this is an action-TD game with has a character/hero in it too, because traditional TD games can get a bit dull after you've laid out all your traps and there's nothing left for you to do except watch the action unfold.

And of all the action-TD games I've played, this has to be the best by far.  And that's not a criticism of its competitors, I like those too!  This one just does everything right.

 - The environment is excellent - the music, graphics, effects, story, etc.
 - The action is requires skill and thought.
 - The traps are diverse and allow for decent strategy.
 - The RPG / level up elements work really well, are very varied, and compelling.

author: {'steamid': '76561198313667807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 2202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 928, 'last_played': 1560787866}
review: Jolie découverte. Ce Tower Defense a du bon malgré des petits bugs graphiques. Le tutoriel explique proprement les systèmes du jeu et la prise en main qui s'en suit est facile et rapide. Le joueur peut également choisir son style de jeu à travers différentes classes qui peuvent influencer les pièges et les tours qui deviennent vite vos favoris. Le fait de pouvoir jouer des cartes crées par la communauté des joueurs est également un plus non-négligeable. Il manque un peu de souffle cependant mais moi j'aime et je recommande.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993857091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1648472566}
review:
Так себе игруля.

В ней заложен большой потенциал: графика а-ля Disciples III, всякие мистические существа, прокачка героя, TD и т.д. Но интерес быстро затухает, т.к. от реализации концепта одни наброски. Золота тонны, ресурсов тонны, противники (при своевременной прокачке персонажа) не представляют особой угрозы (играл за рукопашника), дополнительные задания реализованы через одно место. В целом это Diablo с элементами TD: клац-клац и готово. У героя очень много вариантов прокачки, но действительно полезными являются лишь единицы. Активные навыки настолько порезанные, что можно про них не вспоминать (докачал персонажа до 16 уровня).

В общем, очень посредственная реализация. Эта игруля ни разу не ровня нашему Alien Shooter TD или X-Morth Defense.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330888468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 507, 'playtime_forever': 3444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1576182158}
review:
Okay, FYI, this is a first impression review, I have only played for a little while. That said, I have high hopes, it looks pretty good.
For starters, I bought the game because I have a fondness for the tower defense genre. As a straight up tower defense game, this seems pretty weak. The locations towers can be placed are pre-determined, though as you unlock more towers you sometimes get a choice of tower types at a location. In general however, there is little strategy and no tactical depth to the the towers. There is also no pathing, and the tower upgrades seem less than exciting.
On the plus side, there is still a strong tactical component in the game, as you get to play one of three character classes and you are on the map during the waves, fighting them yourself alongside the towers. This part seems quite fun,  which is good, because it is the bulk of what the game seems to be about.
The up-grades seem good for the characters though, with a store and a basic crafting. I like that the character in game changes with the armor and items I have equipt myself with. This is perhaps the strongest part of the game.   
Again, on the negative side, there was originally a way to play with other people, this appears to be gone, from what I have read in the other comments.
On the plus side, the sound is excellent, the voice work solid, the visuals are really good and the animation is pretty smooth.
That said, I find the controls confusing (hold down the left button to move?) Oddly enough some very basic control information comes very late in the tutorial, by which I mean several levels in. Do yourself a favor and check the control options. Not only can you change the movement controls to include WASD, but there is a lot more in there. 
I think the biggest confusion is the sense of atmosphere. There was clearly a lot of effort put into the world building and backstory. Each combat area comes with the flavor text, but it doesn't seen to transfer into adding anything to the game play. The encyclopedia fails to give any real depth to the monsters, which seems a major faux pas, which adds to this lack of immersion. They crate some really interesting monsters, which seem to have deep backstories, but to date there is no way to see them.

I will be honest, I got this on sale, and while it is well worth the few bucks I paid, I wouldn't think even five bucks was a fair price.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980771349', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 5428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 533, 'last_played': 1709920697}
review:
It's an interesting game especially if you've played the Van Helsing trilogy.
The game has some audio bugs, works on Win10.
It takes time to put skills in the slot to use, it's not intuitive.
The game's easy level is moderate, medium is hard and hard is impossible, Neocore is clueless.
Anyone who has played the trilogy knows what I'm talking about.
Weapon upgrades are weak, few drop options, skills are weak, you have to make do with traps, they guarantee your survival in the game.
When faced with strong monsters, see what category they are, and use the appropriate traps for them.
I recommend buying it when it's off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028693657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 2946, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2946, 'last_played': 1469855801}

author: {'steamid': '76561197961267377', 'num_games_owned': 688, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 6504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4534, 'last_played': 1558575552}
review:
It's a really fun mix of Tower Defense + ARPG. I wish we had more games like this and Orcs Must Die.

I saw people complaining about the number of maps (13) the thing is that after you beat the last map you can replay everything other 3 times and it's NOT just the same map with extra enemies + hp, the map designs are the same, but the paths of the waves, the trap spots, the enemies... everything else changes.

Suggestion for new players: If you are playing solo pick the Sorceress or the Mercenary. The Marksman skill resource only regens when you are not in combat, IMO this made him way less fun to play (especially early game when you don't have a ton of upgrade points).

author: {'steamid': '76561198008049239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 616, 'last_played': 1549881077}
review:
Mélange entre un ARPG et un Tower Defense on se retrouve ici avec un bon mélange de genres. 
Et ça marche.
On incarne un héros qui sera soit guerrier, soit magicien, soit archer, qui a des compétences qu'on devra monter et un équipement qu'on devra looter à la fin de chaque niveau. Y'a même un peu de craft.
Notre personnage arpentera niveau après niveau dans un mode campagne avec 3 niveaux de difficulté ce qui lui octroiera, points de compétence, points de piège et or.
Une fois la campagne achevée, ce qui se fait en 4/5 heures en moyenne, on a accès pour chaque niveau à un mode scénario et un mode sans fin qui permet de continuer à monter les compétences et améliorer notre personnage.
Ca ajoute une bonne durée de vie et du challenge pour ceux qui en cherchent.

Graphiquement c'est propre mais assez peu lisible.
La bande son est pas mal, notamment la musique qui porte l'action pendant les vagues de monstres.

Après je dois avouer que le style graphique me déplait. Le jeu est peu contrasté, on voit mal l'action et ça donne un effet flou en général. 

Cela dit, le jeu est très bon

author: {'steamid': '76561197993416984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1633, 'last_played': 1699934473}
review:
A surprisingly good game, Deathtrap's story isn't going to rock your world, but the gritty environments, wretched creatures, and explosions definitely will. The soundtrack is very limited, but also very excellent; the voice acting is mostly good; the monsters range from mythological beasts to disgusting creations of flesh and metal. 

More than just a tower defense game, the player has the ability to choose between the classic A-RPG sort of ranged/melee/magic classes in order to augment the defenses. Further, each character has access to trap skills, class skills, a market, and crafting. Points and loot are awarded at the end of each game, which you will use to improve your character's capabilities. These can be reset as needed, and gear is lootable (at the end of the game), purchasable and craftable with gold being a standard currency, and diamond, emerald, topaz, and ruby being used in crafting as well. Bonus rewards are available for defeating certain wild NPCs in a game.

As for the towers, there are various tower bases, each with a host of unlock and upgrade options that behave in certain ways and effect certain enemies, (hordes, armored, etc.). For instance, spawn traps can be unlocked to release werewolves, archers, suicide attackers, spawn ghouls from the dead, etc. And, of course, these traps reward the player with lots of little chunks of monsters, giving the game a very Diablo-eque feel. The traps are purchased using in-match currency known as essense, which is slowly replenished by killing the invaders.

To make things short and simple, what is the moral of the story? Do you like Tower Defense games? Do you like dark fantasy? Are you okay with some Action RPG gameplay to augment the tower defense? If the answers are mostly "Yes", then welcome home. Just be warned, this is not a casual "sit back and listen to some music/talk radio" tower defense game- it can get intense, so don't expect this to be a game to relax to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032649576', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 687, 'playtime_forever': 1094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1091, 'last_played': 1708971706}
review:
I would like to write positively, but the game has fallen quite a bit since years ago.
Bugs and quite a lot needs to be balanced. Some achievements don't work.
The variety of enemies is quite scarce. And it emphasizes repetition.
A lot of traps and upgrades for the character, but most of them are pretty useless.
There is not much variety in the items for the hero either.
Quite a few levels and the degree of difficulty varies them very little.
There is an option for additions, but they never did.
Multiplayer is dead or there is no one.
With a discount, it's worth something.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963147828', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 583, 'last_played': 1547416396}
review:
A good game but I can't recommend it because of the very short single player campaign and that most of the 'content' is just repetition.

There are only 13 maps to the single player campaign which I got 10 hours out of, having now finished them the only option I have is to replay them on increasing difficulties.

Or I can play a challenge but on the same maps or versus an opponent on the same maps or endless on the same maps.

Like Diablo 2 the monsters gain immunities and you take more damage from various attacks you can counter with resistances, but it is all on the same maps.

The skill tree is comprehensive, you get to equip your character out novelly -  for a tower defence - like in Diablo 2 and there is even crafting, and the trap upgrades are also very comprehensive as well.

BUT, I have no real compulsion to learn all of the intricacies as all I have to apply them to are the same maps over and over again.

Challenge, versus and endless modes are of no interest to me at all.

There are the community maps and this seems to be where the developers were looking for their content to come from, personally I like and infinitely prefer official content, 13 maps is definitely not enough.

So faced with tinkering with all of the permutations I have been given to advanced in what they call Tiers on the maps I have already seen I have lost interest.

A shame, with more campaign maps to challenge me I would have put the time and effort in, but without it I have no interest in playing further even using the very, very demanding achievements.

I think it is a game for people who like to repeat the same things over and over but with little change and I certainly can't face getting

I certainly can't face 100k monster kills when 10 hours has only given me 10k.

And another disappointment – even basic achievements are bugged, finishing the campaign and I haven’t registered one tower or ground trap build.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091227164', 'num_games_owned': 2673, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3152, 'last_played': 1585400902}
review:
Vale. Recordais los mapas de defensa de torres de la saga The Incredible adventures of Van Helsing? Pues si os gustaron, este es vuestro juego, sólo que con mecánicas ampliadas. Para los que no conocen esos maravillosos juegos, Deathtrap combina las mecánicas de un Tower Defense con las de un ARPG tradicional. Similar a juegos como Orcs Must Die o Sanctum, pero con vista isometrica y controles más similares a los de Diablo o Titan Quest. 

He de decir que sólo he jugado el modo de un jugador, y nunca he probado el multiplayer o el modo versus. Pero como juego de un solo jugador me gusta y me parece satisfactorio, además de tener elementos como un editor de mapas y acceso al workshop, asi que no lo veo en absoluto limitado. Puedes escoger entre tres personajes, con estilos de juego diferentes, a los que debes levear y equipar, y un buen puñado de trampas que vas mejorando conforme leveas. 

En general, es un buen juego, con un buen apartado artistico (aunque un tanto oscuro) y una buena banda sonora. Los controles responden bien, y son iguales a los de cualquier ARPG. Lo recomiendo encarecidamente, sobre todo a los amantes de esos dos generos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133281543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2857, 'last_played': 1492260561}
review:
[b]+ Pros +[/b]
+ A very entertaining gameplay
+ A large amount of traps and skills that allow a diversified gameplay
+ A functional multiplayer mode
+ Stunning and detailed graphics.

[b]- Cons -[/b]
- Serious balance and design problems with certain levels.
- A high price for a game that reuses existing models and doesn't introduce anything revolutionary.

[b] Gameplay[/b]
Deathtrap is a spinoff to The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing series. It's based on the tower defence mechanics, estrapolated directly from its parent. It's similar to Sanctum, mixing turrets and playable characters with their passive and combat skills defending a point from incoming waves of enemies.

There are three basic character types to choose from, with the Archer class being the most vulnerable and difficult to manage. Each class has a vast skill tree, allowing players to evolve their character in the most suitable way. In addition there are also some interesting passive skills and a skill set that influence turrets' price, power, speed and other attributes. 
The turrets are all very interesting and different with their design and properties. This gives the player a chance to experiment with their own setups. There are also many various enemies, that can be studied more in deep through the games' bestiary.

The multiplayer game mode is well balanced and improves the experience greatly, allowing players to use different strategies when assigning skill points and combining different approaches together. Having a second player is also useful when retrieving extra loot keys outside of the track, which is only possible when hordes of enemy units are approaching..

There is a crafting system, but it's quite limited. It can be summarized in scrapping the right items to receive desired material and then rerolling until the result is satisfying. 

Overall the game is challenging enough to provide entertaiment and sometimes it's required to attempt clearing a level several times, to fully understand how to approach it. There are, however, some levels that are poorly designed and are nearly impossible to complete without following precise directions from a previous player, making the game really frustrating.
For those who have played the Van Helsing series it might be appealing to be able to play again immersed in the same world. A majority of the models used in this game have been reused from the main titles. Giving so life to a new game based on those few tower defense moments that were already implemented, without daring anything to enrich the experience.

[b]Graphics[/b]
Graphics are excellent. There is so much details to them, it's just astonishing. Animations are fluid and all the effects are spotless. It doesn't have any performance issues, running smoothly all the time, no matter how many units are on the field.

[b]Price and Value[/b]
This game is quite pricey, considering it's almost entirely recycled files put together to create a new product. While having found another use for the resources that have already been utilised in a former game is not necessarily a negative thing, it's not enough to just present an already used gameplay idea and to sell it for 19.99€. It would need more, a step further, but instead it's just an extra room for a mini game from the original series. An example of the correct application of this mechanics  would be The Talos Priciple, which uses Serious Sam models, but the effort amount is very put into it is significantly different. It provides us with something totally new and well thought. This game is worth being played, but surely not for its full price.

[b]Bugs and Issues[/b]
Sometimes when a player character dies, it can remain stuck, hindering significantly the completion of a level. Although some stages are not designed at their best and require either a precise tactical approach or some grinding, which is not advisable, because it would ruin the diifficulty balance once that particular phase has been completed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013990301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 226, 'playtime_forever': 2523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2523, 'last_played': 1546716902}
review:
An interesting merge of tower defense and RPG game, although the latter is quite simplistic.

The campaign is rather short - 13 maps doable in under 10h - however there is a lot of replayability. You can play the campaign 3 more times on increased difficulty (with different enemies, paths, towers available - only the base map is the same). Furthermore, after completing the campaign 6 extra maps become available. And all of them can be played in custom mode (where you can increase difficulty for extra rewards) and in endless mode.

There are two types of skill points:
[list]
[*] skill points for your character's skill - you always gain experience and level up like in any RPG game
[*] research points for improving traps - these you get only after completing the campaign maps, depending on the number of stars you acquired and occassional side quests
[/list]

The latter is the part that I dislike the most, as it seems to me that I won't be able to max out all the traps. I am using only 8 out of 35 available traps, and to use others, I would have to spend a lot of gold to reassign the research points.

On top of these 35 researchable traps, there are also plenty of special towers that can be sometimes built on some maps.

There are occasional freezes and crashes (about once in 5 hours) and some bugs (such as non-working borderless window mode) remain unfixed for years.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277898518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 794, 'last_played': 1696903801}
review: Deathtrap is such a unique tower defense game. I love all the traps and upgrading my abilities. The single mode is so entertaining and addicting Ive yet to even try 2 player or co-op. I really hope for Deathtrap 2. I totally recommend this game if you love tower defense games because it is very fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014374374', 'num_games_owned': 712, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1544983988}
review:
I enjoyed this game a lot.

What I liked:
- The atmoshere, obscure and great art and voices.
- Very addictive, lots of different strategies to test.
- The mix of ARPG vs TD is superb.
- Some maps require  to plan quite a bit the strategy.

What I didn't like:
- The skill tree is not very interesting, with lots of +N% to some statistic.
- The loot obtained is kind of the same, +N% better than the previous piece you had.

Overall... highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050369301', 'num_games_owned': 805, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 2027, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2026, 'last_played': 1590102510}
review:
Хорошая попытка скрестить RPG и TowerDefence увенчалась появлением Deathtrap.
Несмотря на неочень богатый выбор классов, игра доставляет море удовольствия. Приятный саундтрек, интересные локации, множество башен и лута. Обидно только одно, обещанный совместный режим является совместным режимом Шрёдингера...
Однозначно, обязательна к ознакомлению, 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198414755803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1345, 'last_played': 1544147304}
review:
ひとまず一周終わったところでレビューしておきます。

タワーディフェンスとしてはちょっとアクション要素が強すぎるのと、適当にやってもクリアできてしまう戦略性の低さが物足りないかもしれません。勝てない場合は単純にレベルか装備が足りないだけで、タクティカルな要素はほぼないです。レベル装備に自分で縛りを入れれば、そういった楽しみ方もできるかもしれませんが…。結局パワーゲームになってしまいがちですね。
そしてRPGとしてはレベル上げがマゾすぎてとてもではないですがモチベが続きません。
1ステージに時間がかかりすぎて気軽にちょっとレベル上げするかという感じでプレイできないのが痛いです。
またレベルが上がってもすごく微妙にしか強くならず、転職とかの「目標」もないのでやりがいが感じにくいです。

せめて美女化MODでもあればもう少しやる気になったかもしれませんね（ゲス

尚、コープについてはほぼ死んでいると言っていいでしょう。マッチングが成立したことは一度もないです。

author: {'steamid': '76561197960795706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 4011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4011, 'last_played': 1541247970}
review:
そこまでディープでないハクスラとタワーディフェンスの融合ゲーム。
セール時に500円で買えば、お釣りが来るぐらいには遊べます。暇つぶしに最適。協力プレイも楽しく、遊ぶのに不自由しないレベルの日本語化modもあり。

author: {'steamid': '76561197974842571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 1487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1464, 'last_played': 1545363798}
review:
I judge every Tower Defense game ever by the standard set by Orcs Must Die 1 and 2, as to me that is the perfect Tower Defense game.

Deathtrap is a very good Tower Defense game.   It's like playing Diablo III with Towers helping you.   That's the best way to sum it up.  Get it.

Only Con.  Same Con I apply to all Tower Defense games that have tiny stingy wave amounts.  5 miserable waves per map? Lame. Give us 35 waves. GIVE US TIME PLAYED FOR OUR MONEY

author: {'steamid': '76561197969749884', 'num_games_owned': 2459, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 31877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20356, 'last_played': 1541518344}
review:
Deathtrap is a little bit like Orcs Must Die. Only gorier. A lot gorier. Probably the goriest tower defense game I've ever played.

Featuring myriads of traps, different player characters, good performance, nice visuals and lots of levels, this is any RPG tower defense gamers dream come true.

Sadly the multiplayer is almost dead (which is even more sad, as it one of the most fun modes) and the single player campaign is so-so at best, but this is still in no way detrimental to the possible enjoyment to get out of this game.

Will probably get back to this once in a while.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165362396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1538683920}
review:
Great atmosphere, music and art. Gameplay was fun, I say that as someone unfamiliar with the genre, so take it as you will.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002027189', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 2434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2432, 'last_played': 1538048889}
review:
[h1] Tower of Van Helsing [/h1]

Классическая "Защитные башни" с героями только во вселенной игры Van Helsing.
Линии, Монстры, Башни, Герои. Все как обычно.

Плюсы: RPG состовляющие, большое разнообразие ловушек и навыков, и их прокачки. Достаточно сложное прохождение, интересные испытания на аренах.

Минусы: Мало героев, нестабильная оптимизация.

[i] Будь здесь больше героев, кооператив больше чем на 3-х человек и своеобразные генератор уровней было бы поинтересней. Это конечно лично мои недочеты. [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198043557222', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 526, 'last_played': 1532936357}
review:
Игра неплохая для своего жанра. Три персонажа, несколько режимов, возможностей развития персонажа, множество ловушек / башен и возможности комбинировать тактики. Все это хорошо и привлекает.
Но очень сильно портит впечатления от игры интерфейс. Как в плане самой графики, так и того, что называется UX. Часто не видно прицела, куда ты стреляешь. Монстры в лесу черные на черном не заметны. И другие моменты.
В целом оставляет ощущение незавершенности процесса разработки. Как будто игру не довели до конца. В итоге не могу игру рекомендовать, так как есть лучшие альтернативы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122670762', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1413, 'last_played': 1707498548}
review:
Being only able to build certain types of traps in certain places is odd, but I got used to it quickly and combining different towers and ground traps for combo-attacks is fun. 

I only played the marksman so far (who maybe wasnt the best decision for a starting character?) and the overal tower defense mechanics are nice, but I like experimentation, so the 200 gold cost for resetting each separate trap- and skillpoint is quite a pain for me. It is possible to invest in a skill that increases the gold gain by up to 50%, but that reduces the effectiveness of the character, which is quite needed in the higher tiers of the maps.

There seems to be an unresolved issue about game crashes / freezes too (I only experienced this twice so far), and according to a discussion thread some achivements are unavailable without reverting to an earlier version of the game.

I got back to the game after writing a negative review about it at first and now I can recommend Deathtrap, at least if you pick it up on sale.
