author: {'steamid': '76561198012082932', 'num_games_owned': 2279, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1475465531}
review:
[h1]RPG塔防类型游戏[/h1]

总体感觉比较优秀，用来打法时间不错。另外本游戏支持汉化补丁，见文章最后下载地址。

+ 类似大菠萝英雄系统，有各种装备，技能树等等，内容非常丰富
+ 五种防御塔类型可选，防御塔还有技能树可以点
+ 每关还有支线任务，完成之后，会有丰富奖励

- 优化有点感人，我970显卡，稍微有一点点卡
- 终究逃离不了刷刷刷命运……

[h1]评分：7.6/10[/h1]

[url=http://steamcn.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=195714]汉化补丁下载地址（2016.06.11 亲测有效）[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561197993357882', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1077, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 775, 'last_played': 1467146460}
review: A pretty good stand in for the beloved Dungeon Keeper. The game is more like a mix between Dungeon Keeper and Diablo, kind of like the Deception series on Playstation. You place traps but have to move around and engage the enemy to win.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024454798', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 475, 'last_played': 1660322966}
review:
I'm not a huge fan of steam games, except Skyrim and Baldur's gate 1 & 2. Usually I buy something and usually I'm not satisfied afterwarts, but this game is something else.

I'm not very far into the game, but played now 4 maps and I've watched a trap tutorial, but I have high hopes that this will be really rewarding to play.

Definitely recommend this, gosh I have even written a review, rarely do that stuff. I say worth the money!!!
Greetings hope it will make you a good decision whether to buy or not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022462326', 'num_games_owned': 2123, 'num_reviews': 206, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1451815075}
review:
黑暗風格的血腥塔防

優點:
* 多樣化的陷阱與防衛塔，甚至還有狼人裝置與弓箭隊這種招喚物防禦裝置
* 每種建築物都有三種不同的特性可供玩家持續升級
* 小怪死亡的演出還蠻ok的 被物理陷阱攻擊必定會血肉模糊 火烤就是變成灰燼
* 英雄的技能天賦系統與物品系統相當齊全,可以猛衝攻擊力來提高尾刀效率或是提高技能冷卻率強化技能釋放
* 怪物種類繁多，關卡Boss有特殊技能，地圖上甚至還有野怪設定
* 光是內建的關卡數量就相當多，本作甚至還支援工坊可以互相交流自製地圖

缺點:
* 沒啥劇情,也沒什麼特殊的演出橋段
* 一個人玩會蠻手忙腳亂的，有時地圖的出怪口並不會只有一個，如果是單人玩家可能就會要多利用傳送點跑位

預告片很有趣有空一定要看一看. xD!

author: {'steamid': '76561197977567326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 6477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 714, 'last_played': 1674235274}
review:
This is superb.  Still room for improvement - it'd be nice to put tower types where I wanted, rather than only certain tiles taking certain traps, but that's it.  The rest is fantastic.

Available in current Humble Bundle - it's an essential purchase for any TD fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048838098', 'num_games_owned': 1401, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1489420120}
review: I like the concept but the interface is really rough, performance is terrible on my reasonably specc'd PC (I can run Witcher 3, Fallout 4, and Doom fine but not this?) it hangs and crashes worse than anything I've played in years (including some crashes that forced me to hot reset my computer), and when I can actually get to gameplay it's reasonably fun but nothing to write home about. I really can't find much to recommend about it. Glad it came in a bundle for me or I'd be really disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059344583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1514431794}
review:
holy crap, could this be the perfect game? ok it says its a tower defense rpg right? that doesnt even scratch the surface of how great this game is as far as depth and replayability abd im only a few hours in and not max level.
lets start with towers there are the tower types magik, mechanical and summons doesnt seem like a lot? well each trap has 3 levels and 2 perks per trap to level! in addition you get to decide during game how you want the trap to act by which of the 3 tiers you want to upgrade (protip max you gun turrets as soon and as high as possible) 
Next lets talk about skill tree up to 6 active slots that can be leveled up with skill points for alot of specilization not alot to talk about here but when you get into it you will see its pretty rich and fulfilling.
Oh your character has gear, i know right!!! basic item rarity grey thru gold usual diablo style stats from health to magik find bretty good in my opinion alot of familiarity in this game
crafting is simple but enjoy the randomness and ability to craft most gear.
inventory has charachter and shared stash between all characters.
has coop and vs. coop is awesome havent tried vs.

ok now here is what i think can be improved on the game

maps. the maps are standard tower defense but the only problem is placing of towers there are preset locations for the 3 types of towers on each map, this is fixed via workshop but i enjoy the perks of campaign mode.

graphics.  this is a good a\nd a bad this game should run on the lowliest potatoe so as long as you friend has a computer he can play with or against you. i cant put my finger on what bothers me on the graphics it may be the art style but it is a small turn off.


TLDR: has crafting,coop,inventory stat and skill progression, fun gameplay. heartfelt 8/10 grab this on the humble bundle staff picks you definetely wont regret it. and give a lil extra these guys deserve it.

DISCLAMER: DID NOT GET THIS GAME FOR FREE BUT A HELLA DEAL ON HUMBLE BUNDLE

author: {'steamid': '76561198106305716', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1462883434}
review:
디아블로 디펜스 버전인데 스토리가 거의 없다시피하다.
레벨을 올려서 스킬을 올리고 미션을 깨서 함정점수를 벌어서 함점스킬을 업글해야 한다.

노가다성이 짙고 커스터마이즈도 작지만 협동으로 하는 점이 꽤 재밌다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009586772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 1136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1126, 'last_played': 1474257117}
review:
Pros+ 

-game is fun and if you liked van helsing and the sequels and the TD in those games..this is essetentially more of the same (but a bit more fleshed out)
-graphics are nice
-gameplay is solid
-lots of loot, character levels etc

the Bad-

-as awesome as the game is, and as fun as it is...it is VERY short. the only option after you go through singleplayer is either do the same missions over again on harder difficulty, do challenge missions (in same levels but with even harder challenges that you pick) or go online and try to do someone elses maps. 

-18 ish hours is pretty good for a game thats only 20 bucks, but realistically since it seems like they aren't adding anymore to the game, i can't justify telling someone to pay full price for this game. 
-some weird bugs (changing an armor set might freeze the game up)
-lots of levels to level up..yes ( i am at 23) and it appears you can get over 50 levels..however, levelling up involves playing the same levels you just did in the campaign..again and again. 


Summary-

Do i recommend it (overall yes...BUT only when its on for half price or less). At full prices although the game is fun,  there just isn't enough here to justify paying 21 bucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008909623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1462556684}
review:
NO SOUND at all. No sound in cinematics, no sound in menu, no sound in game...

Game comes with a gamebreaking bug that seem to be in the Van Helsing engine since 3 years ago. They solve the bug and it appeared again with last tiny-update (5 months after the last one) and they ignore all of us who have this bug. 0 words, 0 promises, 0 support.

So, they make a 3 fixes update just to put this on sale for a week and ignore everyone who has a problem. Well done, guys, you show us you care :S

Well, i'm forced to ask for a refund because i cannot play (well, i can play if i make the game sound effects myself: plaf!, splash!, bang!, pow! chew chew! very funny, uh?)

Almost 10 days since the patch, a whole thread of people reporting the same (even people that had the game prior to the patch and now don't have sound) and 0 support...And it was reported the same day of the patch that, curiously, fixes a game starting bug (and little more, see by yourself) Wow, just wow:

http://steamcommunity.com/app/310510/discussions/1/357285398695741576/

I don't care if they solve this in a few months (when they need another sale), not going to support these kind of devs. Shame to you.

PD: My 0.4 hours played translates in more than 3 real hours trying to solve this myself, looking at the same problem 3 years ago in their own forums. After waiting 10 days after the patch for some answer, i am forced to refund this (last chance to do it)

PD2: Maybe you are lucky and the bug does not affect you. But it is on the engine side, not on player systems (no drivers or miracles to solve this by yourself, then)

author: {'steamid': '76561198108151575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3194, 'last_played': 1636229895}
review:
Overall it's a good game, at good value for its price. Probably has nice replay value.

Pro's:
- Music is totally awesome (and available as .ogg format in the installation folder!)
- Unforgiving if you make a mistake, so plan ahead
- Graphics are very nice

Cons:
- It feels a bit like a clicker sometimes (depending on the hero choice)
- Towers feel a bit underpowered when fighting the harder levels (but that may change)
- Time sink if you don't plan ahead ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561197966358311', 'num_games_owned': 912, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1462745762}
review:
Just bought on steam sale foe me and my brother to play co-op.

I'm surprised that it is getting positive reviews.

Netcode is terrible - two cable internet providers not far from eachother and we are getting freezing, game crashes and a RIDICULOUS bug where his character doesn't progress - randomly no EXP, no items or trap upgrade points.

Don't buy if you want to play co-op - and apparently people are getting crashing on endless mode in single player - so don't hope for replayability either.

This is completely unacceptable for a fully released game on version ~1.05.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047759861', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 675, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 675, 'last_played': 1462796711}
review:
Just to say this game is good.....but just going to lay down differences between 2 games here this one and dungeon defenders.  dungeon defenders has more classes and the classes feel more diverse as not only does each class in dungeon defenders have their own armor/weapon set you also get their own trap set. makes game more interesting when playing solo or with just one friend as you may have to think better about which traps to use. also dungeon defender has open trap placement so you can drop them anywhere and stack like crazy if you like. also dungeon defender has lots of dlc and can all be had very cheaply when its on sale. 

this game carries some similarities and some plusses over dungeon defender one which is not having to pick up anything until the end and the essense is auto grabbed by your kills vs dungeon defender can have loot and mana(their trap points) swept by ninjas or for that matter i think things dissapear after a set time. this also has a map creator which dungeon defender does not. also nice in this game is that you can see monster pathing via the lines as to where dungeon defender does not show lines of walk although its pretty easy to figure out choke points in dungeon defender. this game also has no timer during set up as to where dungeon defender i believe allows one minute to set dungeons up.

the one thing im not sure on is having open trap use. its cool to have all 3 classes open to use any trap but in multiplay i dont know how this works well as you all could end up specializing the same and i don't know how that would work on some maps but in dungeon defender if you see 3 of the same class roll in you probably want to change games or get the others to change classes so your not all laying the same traps down. until this game gets some serious dlc dungeon defenders im going to say is way better.  this game is still good however and i can enjoy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989273094', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 5786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 908, 'last_played': 1518311728}
review:
Deathtrap is a hybrid of Diablo style RPG and tower defense. Overall game-play is very enjoyable in single player. The campaign fits with what backstory there is and the overall atmosphere does have an appeal. The primary downside is the network/matchmaking code.

There are several instances with failures to route and failures to resolve (the match making server). Thus far I have experienced a 100% failure rate either as host or joining a game--where in at least one, if not more parties, could not sync and get in game.

This is not a UDP porting issue (although it could be for some individuals). I, and others, have tried various firewall settings and permission changes without success. While several people do seem to be able to enjoy CO-OP (I've not tried vs mode yet) there are far too many people experiencing issues in multiplayer for "everyone" to have UDP issues locally.

As it stands:
Deathtrap is very enjoyable as a single player game.
Multiplayer is not viable/stable and thus unplayable.

Recommended for single-player only--otherwise this is "coasterware".

author: {'steamid': '76561197990234520', 'num_games_owned': 467, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4056, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1643322959}
review:
Wow, Diablo/Torchlight/Path of Exile meets tower defense. I'm suprised i haven't heard from this game before. Been playing for almost 3 hours and i like it. Runs smooth on stable 60 FPS (you can cap it to 30 if you want).

You can select three different classes :

*Warrior: A tank-type hero class, tailored for fighting in close quarters.
*Sorceress: The anti-thesis of the Warrior, designed for long range fighting using a variety of spells and debuffs.
*Marksman: A ranged fighter, designed for direct damage dealing and amplifying trap effects.

I went Sorceress for my first runthrough cause i like to attack from far since i'm a coward :). Needed to get used to the controls a bit and had to remap some keys (changed moving to WSAD, orginal were the arrow keys, also build is middle mousebutton, changed to mouse 4).

Gameplay feels nice, just like Diablo,Torchlight, etc.There are alot of upgrade options and you can find new items.

+Good idea to combine hack and slash with towerdefence. You can decide to lay back so the towers can do their work or kill enemies yourself
+Has co-op with a max of 4 players and PVP mode (haven't tried this yet because it seems multiplayer is dead?)
+Traps that have spikes (maybe even better then tesla towers, wich are also in this game......)
+When enemies get to into the gate you see a nice skull, so you know you f* up :)
+leveling system, items and equiping your char.
+Satisfying chopping action and the evil laugh it brings (yes i know i have issues :) )

-Stats, if you are a stat lover you spend to much time comparing and analyzing. If multiplayer works  i will probably get kicked for idle to long.
-Crosshair?/cursor is maybe a bit to small when your screen is filled with demons. For me i noticed that i misclicked and instead of action i just walk into the enemy.
-Spike trap maybe better the teslatower from ARM, resulting in a new fetish.

TL:DR : If you like hack and slash and towerdefence then buy this game. 

8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198065459997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 7482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4150, 'last_played': 1655814672}
review: I absolutely loved this game. I enjoy tower defenses - after playing dungeon defenders and sanctum, I decided that I wanted to play something with more blood. I was not disappointed! It feels like a hybrid between diablo (graphics/items/crafting) and sanctum (slots for specific towers, ability to FPS, skill tree for upgrades). I really enjoyed it, and recommend it to anyone who enjoys a casual tower defense game!

review: I was actually suprised at how fun this game is. It is really one of a kind, you have gameplay from games like Path of Exile and Diablo, while at the same time it is a tower defense game. author: {'steamid': '76561197978381846', 'num_games_owned': 4093, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 3477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3451, 'last_played': 1674890634}
review:
Great game to play by yourself or with a team of friends.  It makes you think and react at the same time.  The setup time is extended into the game as the enemies will come in trickles that grow in ferocity.  Just when you think you have it all under control a boss appears and all is lost.  Or you've learned from your past mistakes and you just barely get past him by the skin of your teeth.

This build up, tension, reward system is played out over and over.  As you play you will collect better and better gear to complete the next challenge.  Each class has multiple skills to try so you never feel boxed into a certain way to complete a challenge.  Also your moves mesh well with your friends to make the game even better in multiplayer.

In short this is one of the best games on Steam.   It would be a travesty to not own it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989179135', 'num_games_owned': 785, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 3648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2891, 'last_played': 1565849205}
review:
it's like diablo meets orcs must die. two very amazing games and apparently they go well together.

this is a tower defence rpg game, where you point and click to move to the location desired and attack enemies, like diablo. you kill enemies and gain experience, you level up and assign stat and skill points. when killing enemies you gain essence, this is needed to build more traps, and to upgrade them. at the end of each round you recieve a chest, or sometime more if you find the chests in the maps, which contain items such as weapons, armor, and more.

this is a great game, very fun, very addicting. i can definitely see myself indulging in this for many more hours to come.


PROS:
graphics are good
some thinking is required, a little strategy is in order
lots of traps to use, and even more upgrades for those traps
nice sets of skills/powers to use which can also be upgraded
lots of different enemies to battle
actually has boss fights on each map (so far)
challenging
co-op
different character classes to play as, each one having different skill sets and powers
games runs perfectly smooth, not even a stutter
no bugs or glitches that i have seen (keep in mind i have not yet beaten the game)

CONS:
not a big deal but caping at 60fps makes you run at 56fps. game still runs smooth though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972626310', 'num_games_owned': 444, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 5502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5502, 'last_played': 1460838585}
review:
One of the best tower defence games I've ever played, there's just so many traps and ways to level them up, and on top of that a pretty comprehensive action RPG character system to back up your towers.

It's more intense than I'm used to in this genre so I can't play a lot at once, but when I do play it's a treat. The production values are really high (the aesthetic rocks too) and the enemy types are as varied as the towers you use to kill them.

I recommend this game to any tower defence fan that doesn't mind a bit more of a high energy playstyle (though you can put all your points into traps if you want to rely on them)
--

ps. It crashed when certain sounds played, but I fixed it by disabling some random Windows 10 touchscreen service that was interfering with the game. Hopefully the bugs will be patched for everyone soon so they don't have to worry - the game itself is an absolute pleasure to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006574126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 3529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 630, 'last_played': 1640482963}
review:
Deathtrap is one of those games that is good but not quite great.  While being a decent game in its own right you can't help but think that what it really constitutes is the potential foundation for something better and more polished. Maybe a sequel that improves on the formula in the event that this debut entry is supported enough to warrant one.
       Just to get it out of the way I'll say straight up that I haven't experienced any technical issues with regards to the game not running, crashing, etc. I know that in the past others had complained about what sounded like really specific issues resulting in the game not running properly on their system. That hasn't been the case with me and at this point I've only encountered one very minor bug (twice).
       Characters in Deathtrap control nicely, and by "nicely" I mean "exactly how you'd expected them to given that they represent the action rpg component of the game as advertised". Character specs are meaningful and interesting but not entirely pivotal which is probably as it should be.
       The game's traps are pretty cool for the most part. Some are classics (spike floors, lava tiles, lightning towers, etc.) whereas others are a little more offbeat and serve to keep the tower defense aspect of the game fairly fresh. Traps have upgrades that must be spec'd into to utilize in combat and I think this is where Deathtrap really shines. The traps work like you'd expect them to and are devastatingly effective. Even while defending multiple chokepoints solo you won't feel like your arm is being twisted by artificial difficulty in an attempt to force you into multiplayer. The game gets harder, yes, but only as it ramps up naturally while your character and traps simultaneously gain strength. This alone makes Deathtrap worthy of attention in a development culture rife with micro-transactions fueled by nearly enforced group play. I paid a reasonable one time cover charge for the game and I'm having fun playing it. What more could an avid gamer ask for?
       In the end I'm glad I supported this game and I hope others do too. I'll be looking forward to seeing where they go with it in the future.

*Edit: I re-installed Deathtrap and played it again recently (end of year 2021). I did this because I simply had the urge to play it again, which is a very good sign for any game. I ended up playing more the second time than I did the first and added a significant amount to my overall playtime. Good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978428317', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 4315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4238, 'last_played': 1471973958}
review:
10/10 blood and guts

Seriously though, one of the best Action TD games I've played.

3 characters that all feel different, sooo many towers and upgrades which allow you to really have a stragedy instead of just placing slow towers by a corner surrounded by AOE towers, that won't work in this game and really you can't even do it most of the time!

The only negative which could be a big enough negative for some to not play it, is that you can't place towers where ever you want, and you can only place towers of a specific kind where the map allows you. Coming from old TDs map mods from SC2 and WC3 it was a pretty big let down that the map was already pre-determining my stragedy for me.

Other than that, as you can see I've played this game a lot, its fun to make some coffee, and play for an hour or two then log off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180552287', 'num_games_owned': 480, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 3662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3662, 'last_played': 1454936340}
review:
неплохой товер дефенс с элементами дьяблойда. главный минус - очень кривая прокачка персонажа и слишком навязчивый гринд. прокачка идет 2 путями: прокачка ловушек, и она зависит от эффективности прохождения уровня (причем уровень вы можете пройти только один раз. за повторное прохождение уровня на той же сложности прокачивать ловушки вам не дадут, и прокачка персонажа. прокачка персонажа  очень медленная, и мне проще было взломать игрушку  чит энджайном, нежели задрачивать до посинения одни и те же уровни. кстати, за пользовательские уровни опыта вам также не дадут.

кроме того, игра - побочный продукт ван хельсинговой франшизы. поскольку из нее выжали все что можно, развивать игрушку разрабы вряд ли будут.

в общем, могли бы и лучше. брать со скидкой.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980195249', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3405, 'last_played': 1482797883}
review:
[b][This review is post december 2015 Patch, because I started playing early 2016]	[/b]

[i]First of all, I read some reviews and posts on the comunity hub, so obviously I will say something about the Crash/glitch posts and that is....[/i]

I've been playing this game for more than 40 hours now, most of the time with my mate in duo-coop mode and neither me nor my friend experienced any glitches or crashes. Not a single one. We just play the game.

About the game-play:

I played some amount of tower-defense games, my favourites are probably sanctum 2 and orcs must die 2, so this is where I come from.

Deathrap is intense. It doesn't give you much help in regards of finding out what works best. But you can play around a lot. You can improve/boost/skill you traps, skill your character in plenty of different ways to acustom your play-style. Also there's items that drop after each map. So there is another pool of customisations in regards of stats. There's just so many options. I love it. The rest is standard tower-defense stuff. Enemies spawn from point A/B/C/D and run towards what ever your nexus is called. You cant block or create paths like in some other tower defense games. so you just place floor and tower defenses along the path. Decent Standard Tower-Defense stuff, y'know.

Graphics: It looks decent. Not too fancy, nor crappy and it clearly has some "diablo-chic" going on. Which I like. Not everything has to be cell-shading(sanctum)/comic-style looking (orcs must die).

Performance whise: I run this game on gtx 970 and intel i7 and plenty of ram. So it works. There is the little performance drop you get in nearly every indie game when you reach a certain amount of action on the screen. ( I am talking survival mode 3-hour long session with every tower doing magic stuff and tons of mobs), but it is faaaaaaaar from unplayable, not nearly as laggy as risk of rain sadly tended to get (I love you risk of rain, I will always do). 

So yeah, thats my review. I hope it's not a complete & utter mess to read. Have fun and a nice day.... bye ! 

tl;dr: If you like tower-defense games, skilling, customisations and a little bit of grinding this should be your game. I am having plenty of fun and look forward to future updates.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032500682', 'num_games_owned': 1914, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 4640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4639, 'last_played': 1440712731}
review:
English
------------
Deutsch

Deathrap doesn't seem very appealing at first sight, but so far it sure is the best Tower Defense I've ever played. I'd describe it as a mixture between a Tower Defense like Orcs Must Die 2 and Dungeon Defenders and an Action/RPG like Diablo and Torchlight 2, in a much darker tone. If you played one of them, you'll love this one too. This awesome game definitely needs more attention! 

++ advanced skill tree for 3 different classes
++ 25 different/unlockable traps and more than 150 trap upgrades
++ scenario, endless and a vs. mode
++ rewarding side quests (more loot)
++ crafting/enchanting system
++ various weapons/armor for character customization, from normal to godlike
++ tactical, because of various enemie types
++ different maps and difficulties (collecting 3/3 stars on every map)
++ max Lvl: 100

+/- forced positions/spots for traps

-- only three classes

Still waiting/hoping for any DLC's or Deathtrap 2. Will purchase them in an instant!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Deathrap wirkt auf den ersten Blick nicht besonders ansprechend, gehört aber auf jedenfall zu den besten Tower Defense Spielen die ich je gespielt habe, wenn nicht sogar DAS beste. Ich würde es als einen Mix aus einem Tower Defense wie Orcs Must Die 2 und Dungeon Defenders und einem Action/RPG wie Diablo und Torchlight 2 bezeichnen, in einem deutlich düsteren Ton. Dieses großartige Spiel verdient/braucht definitiv mehr Aufmerksamkeit!

++ umfangreicher Skillbaum für 3 unterschiedliche Klassen
++ 25 verschiedene/freischaltbare Fallen und mehr als 150 Fallen Upgrades
++ Szenario, Endlos und ein VS. Modus
++ lohnende Nebenquests (mehr Beute)
++ Crafting/Verzauberung System
++ viele verschiedene Waffen/Rüstungen zur Charakter Anpassung, von normal bis godlike
++ taktisch, wegen der vielen unterschiedlichen Gegnertypen
++ unterschiedliche Karten and Schwierigkeitsgrade (3/3 Sterne auf jeder Map sammeln)
++ Max Lvl: 100

+/- nicht frei wählbare Positionen/Flächen für Fallen

-- nur drei Klassen

Ich warte/hoffe noch immer auf DLC's oder Deathtrap 2. Diese würde ich ohne mit der Wimper zu zucken sofort kaufen!

author: {'steamid': '76561198120356999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1454943678}
review:
看宣传片还以为是第一人称的3D塔防游戏呢，其实是和火炬之光差不多的2.5D风格的塔防
害我当时那么激动地就买啦
不过也没差啦，算是合格的塔防，而且RPG元素非常丰富
丰富到什么程度呢，我就说说它的技能系统


首先不同塔根据闯关的关数解锁后，每个陷阱或者塔都有三个被动技能可以升级，这三个是需要在battle中进行升级的，需要杀怪获得的点数来升
除了这三个被动技能，每个陷阱或者塔还有两个属性可以升级，这个属性指的是基础伤害之类的

这还只是塔的

这个游戏连人物自己也可以上去打怪，没错，就和大菠萝一样
你甚至要学会走A，因为我玩的maskman是个远程角色
而人物呢，又有自己的技能，又有另外一个技能树，有大概五个主动技能，每个技能呢，又有不同的属性加点方向
除了主动技能还有很多被动技能，比如提高毒属性伤害或者是降低建造塔的费用诸如此类
天哪
还有商店，还有各种品质的装备，打完一关有宝箱，就和大菠萝打完BOSS开箱子一样的
甚至还有武器打造系统，您怎么不加个宝石系统呢

好吧，其实内容还是蛮丰富的，总体还是值得玩一下，毕竟像我这种对塔防毫无抵抗型
不要对画质抱多大期望，宣传片和实物很不同，总体画质类似大菠萝2

author: {'steamid': '76561198114602905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 7662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7170, 'last_played': 1453999374}
review:
Первые впечатления от игры были - «Tower Defense с элементами РПГ! Это круто!». Но по мере прохождения игра внесла некоторые разочарования. Как я понимаю игра вышла по мотивам мини игры из Ван Хельсинга, Антураж, Графика, Геймплей. 

Это TD с возможностью помахать секирой (пострелять с арбалета, покидать фаерболы посохом) отбивая волны всяких монстров. Задача сохранить портал не пропустив по возможности ни одну вражину. По пути прохождения монстров расставляем ловушки, к сожалению только в строго отведенных разработчиками местах.. Ловушки не смотря на Upgrade очень быстро перестают справляться с волнами и практически постоянно вам надо носится по карте и добивать врагов. Ловушки и персонажа можно прокачивать на заработанные очки. 
Все достаточно увлекательно и интересно, но судя по организации игры и ачивкам у авторов стоит задача максимально надолго оставить вас в игре при этом лишив увлекательного приключения при прохождении. В компании несколько карт, каждая из карт имеет 4 варианта прохождения которые различаются по сложности, при этом каждый из вариантов так же имеет три уровня сложности. Варианты отличаются не только сложностью но и местом расположения ловушек. 
Так вот, что бы вам поиграть на 4 варианте, самом сложном, до этого надо пройти все предыдущие варианты карт, не одной и той же карты, а все. Каждый следующий вариант для карт открывается только после полного прохождения всех карт на текущем варианте. С условием, что персонаж и ловушки прокачиваются медленней монстров, а гейм плей в принципе однообразен, то увлекательное приключение при прохождении игры превращается в занудное кликанье мышкой по тем же локациям и по тем же монстрам. Уже к 3 варианту игра уже становиться унылой из-за сложности и однотипности. После открытия 4 варианта я ожидал, что разработчики дадут возможность ставить ловушки там где тебе надо, а не где они определили, но нет ловушки все так же только в определенных местах их мало и места эти далеко не всегда находятся в ключевых точках. Сложность прохождения начинает зашкаливать, но хардкорностю на мой взгляд не пахнет. Хардкор когда сложно и интересно пробуешь все новые и новые варианты, а тут унылость.  
Так же в каждом варианте есть карта сценария и карта с бесконечными волнами. Т.е. Что бы пройти всю игру вам надо снова по тем же локациям (плюс еще 5) пройти сценарии.

Разработчики хотя бы в картах с бесконечными волнами могли дать возможность расставлять ловушки там где игроку нужно, а не там где вы решили. Все равно сущности для установки ловушек и апгрейда всегда не хватает. 

Сетевую часть игры не оценил, 4-5 раз пробовал найти серваки для игры, но увы пусто. Возможно не то время было.  
Санктум 2 на несколько порядков интересней.

Плюсы
Графика Атмосфера из игры Ван Хельсинг
Саундтрек хорошо вписывается в игру
Tower Defense с возможностью прямого участия в процессе истребления нежити
Достаточное количество карт и вариантов игры
Прокачка героев, ловушек

Минусы
Компания при полном прохождении становится унылой
Есть беда с управлением, часто вместо того что бы врагов гасить герой наматывает круги. 
Сложность из-за которой приходиться проходить те же карты не один раз — уныло
Герой, Ловушки прокачиваются намного медленней монстров
Карты с бесконечными волнами — тоска. Один и тот же набор монстров штурмует вас с каждой волной у них просто прибавляется здоровье
Ачивки направленные на то, что бы вы сидели в игре (Убить стопитцот тысяч врагов. Собрать лимон, Дойти до 30 уровня в Endless, Пройти все сценарии и т.д.) Зачем?

В целом играбельно.
Сетевой режим должен быть интересней компании. 
Любителям TD советую ознакомиться с игрой и лучше делать это со скидкой 
7 волн из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198071223031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 980, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 980, 'last_played': 1537005547}
review:
非常棒的塔防遊戲！

可以用傑出來形容！

開最高畫質，畫面非常漂亮！

十幾年前從魔獸地圖開始迷上塔防，今天這款Death Trap是我認為最棒的塔防遊戲！

第一名！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198005386165', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1592, 'last_played': 1481479687}
review:
Un tower defense sympathique. Une progression et une difficulté bien dosée. 3 personnages jouables, avec un gameplay bien différents. 
Un nombre assez importants de sorts et d'améliorations pour le personnage. Un système de craft, de loots, et d'achats d'items. Le bestiaire est assez diversifié. La disposition des pièges changent en fonction du tiers des monstres et surtout du nombre de joueurs dans le partie. Le jeu est quand même orienté coop. Même si le mode solo est faisable il est vivement conseillé de jouer avec des amis. 

Petits soucis notables si on veut chipoter. Notamment une interface et des menus confus et trop chargés. Une recherche multijoueurs assez fastidieuse. Autre petite chose qui m'a fait grincer des dents, est la perte totale de l'argent ainsi que améliorations des pièges lors de la création d'un nouveau personnage. Et pour finir, le jeu est totalement en anglais. 

Vraiment un très bon jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015218930', 'num_games_owned': 361, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1794, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1784, 'last_played': 1642016531}
review: Игра из себя не чего особенного не представляет, но она очень красочная и этим сильно подкупает и хочеться играть и играть в неё, конечно она немного однообразная, но сделанная игра на все свои 10 баллов для меня. Она проста и увлекательна все что нужно для такой игры. Ведь это просто башенки

author: {'steamid': '76561198012306547', 'num_games_owned': 813, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 5499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5499, 'last_played': 1452179320}
review:
TDとアクションRPGを混ぜたらこんなんなりました的なゲーム
ソーサレスでキャンペーンモード4周目三ツ星クリアした時点のレビュー

システムについてはTDだけど自分でも攻撃できるタイプ
あとはRPGなこともありキャラにレベル・スキル・装備品の概念がある

ちなみにキャンペーン以外には難度を自分で上げることにより
その分報酬を増やせるシナリオモードとエンドレスモードがある
またCo-opと対戦もあるようだが未プレイ

あと自作マップをworkshopで公開して遊べるけど
みんなレベリングの為のクソマップばっか量産したせいで
workshopのマップでは経験値もアイテムも手に入らなくなった


キャンペーン1周やるだけなら適当にやって簡単に三ツ星クリアできるが
ろくにエンディングもなく1周終了時点で実績が5%くらいしか解除できないことからも
やりこみ前提のゲームと思われる。キャンペーンは各マップ4周分用意されてる

とはいえキャンペーン4周までハードでやってみて詰まったマップは2つくらい
ソーサレスプレイで3周目bottomless pitと4周目necropolisで初見時死んだけど
やり方変えたらすんなりクリアできた

スキルにしろトラップにしろ序盤から使用できたものが
なんだかんだでかなり強かったり使い勝手良かったりするのが残念
特にライトニング、範囲攻撃&どんな敵にも確実に効くスタン効果付与可能とか強すぎ
上位スキルなはずのレーザーさんや火柱さんの気持ちを考えるべき

トラップに関してはシステム上設置可能な種類・数・位置はマップごとに固定のため
あまり複雑な組み合わせを楽しむことはできない

やりこみが前提なはずなのにできることが少ない、なんとももどかしいゲーム
でも嫌いじゃない、ぼーっとする分には楽しい
ほら、ハクスラだってレアアイテム探しぼーっとやるの楽しいでしょ。・・・え？違う？

author: {'steamid': '76561198226152136', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1515141764}
review:
Hands down i recommend buying this not even a second thought.  Somehow the dev's successfully combined a diablo style rpg with tower defence this game deserves much more credit.  Amongst many nice features the game also has a built in editor to create maps for your friends as well as full steam workshop support and downloadable maps.

If you miss the days of playing dota 1 on Warcraft 3 this is for you!

Just buy it now dont even think, throw your money at them lol.

Update
8th May 2020

Sadly the games server is offline with no obvious resolution in sight.  It seems its still possible to play with Lan using some tricks or a VPN.  Ive petitioned THQ Nordic to buy the rights its a good game and really its a shame if no one can play online anymore, realistically.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998065795', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 781, 'last_played': 1705351553}
review: Great game! It's a shame there isn't a larger player base because surprisingly the multiplayer ACTUALLY WORKS.  It's sad this is a surprise these days, but many multiplayer systems, especially those that attempt to integrate with steam seem to be very clunky and operate spotty at best.  Here you have a great example of a simple, effective group system.  Nothing super innovative in the actual gameplay just a good combination of static pathed tower defense with third person wave killing.  Feels very similar to playing Smite.  The fact that the mobs will move out of path and chase you down for a period is an interesting addition.  Would highly recommend this game, especially on sale!

author: {'steamid': '76561198043053678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 6099, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5372, 'last_played': 1489696632}
review:
Лучший TowerDefence в который мне доводилось играть: потрясающая атмосфера, удобное управление, интересная система развития/крафта, много уровней сложности - вообщем играть приятно)

П.С. 
Пару переписывал обзор, т.к. в начале игра мне очень понравилась, но потом поиграв я заметил что сложность растёт с уровнем играка и независимо от уровня сложности и это мне не понравилось. Хотя потом разобравшись понял что система сложностией немного сложнее чем я думал. Собственно разобратся в сложностях тоже интерсно и даже можно получить игровую выгоду используя разные сложности.
[spoiler]Игра имеет как бы 2 режима: сюжетный(хотя сюжета там мягко говоря нет, он и не нужен)  - сложность монстров там фиксированая и всякие чаленджи вроде сценариев и бесконечных волн - сложность там действительно растёт с уровнем игрока, это слегка обесценивает рпг систему но не сильно, вообщем в игре важен и фарм и расстановка башен.[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561197988258200', 'num_games_owned': 458, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1651343381}
review:
Скрестили ежа с ужом.
И получилось очень неплохо. Tower defense + RPG составляющая игры. Как и в любых других TD играх мы строим башенки на пути монстров. Выбор этих башенок очень большой. Плюс эти башни можно улучшать по ходу боя несколько раз. А также их можно улучшить и после боя чтобы в следующий раз надавать монстрам по щам ещё быстрее.
Кроме того далеко не в каждой TD кроме башен есть ещё и главный герой которым мы собственно и управляем и которым вносим немаленький урон в общую картину геноцида монстров.
После боя кроме улучшения башен мы можем прокачать и нашего героя. Увеличить урон егоспособностей, одеть в новую броню которая у нас выпала либо в конце уровня, либо прикупить в магазине за внутриигровую валюту. Никакого доната, всё своими руками. А то уже надоели эти игры с вливанием реала. Этим конечно грешать онлайн игры, но мало ли.
Иногда выпадают рецепты и можно скрафтить шмотку новую и довольно неплохую. Крафт конечно элементарный, но он всё же есть.
Можно играть совместно, но попробовал разок найти команду и в течении 3 минут так никого и не было. То ли онлайн невысок, то ли мой уровень ещё мал.
Из TD игр это очень и очень неплохой вариант. Однозначно рекомендую любителям жанра.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993299430', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 3865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3466, 'last_played': 1450583254}
review:
I like this game. It's not orcs must die, but it's good. I'm more into "get in there and headshot my enemies" than "diablo-style clicking around", but after putting 50 hours into this I am only now starting to get bored (so it managed to keep my attention for this long!).
The good:
Decent trap ideas.
Fun challenges on higher levels of difficulty, such as "you can only build this one kind of trap! and we will send a ton of very specific enemies at you. Good luck."
Fun inventory management: collecting/buying items to boost hero skills and trap levels.
A ton of options for upgrades: every trap has 4 things to level up.
Amusing voice acting (that sorceress was so flustered and yet so driven!).
Side quests on missions.
Availability of PVP.
Level editor!
Good soundtrack.
Scenario mode allows players to increase map difficulty in specific ways for higher rewards, (i.e. "enemies have a 30% chance of respawning! but you also get a bonus to XP. Your choice.").

The not-so-good:
I prefer being able to choose which traps i place and where, but this game restricts you to a few pre-defined slots, and the slots are restriced to a specific type of trap (so you have to choose 1 out of 5). It's fun later on to be restricted, as it's a greater challenge, but it was kind of boring on the first playthrough. I wish there was more freedom, at least in the beginning.
Endless mode isn't much fun (this is where Orcs Must Die did much better). Here they use that stupid idea that to make a game more difficult one must exponentially increase the enemy life bar. So once you get to higher waves - the traps do pretty much nothing, and i personally got really bored sitting there clicking on the same little nobody (the guy that should die in one hit), waiting for him to die for like 5 minutes.
Gets repetitive as there are only 13 campaign maps and then you just replay them 4 times on higher difficulties. (Yes, there are also 5 more maps that open up after 1st playthrough,  but you can only do them in Scenario-mode.)

Anyway, overall it's a good buy if you're into tower defense and don't mind Diablo combat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057156069', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1818, 'last_played': 1608979060}

review: Un tower defense di altissimo livello e ricco di personalizzazioni. Ore ed ore di gioco ed un'ottima modalità multiplayer e cooperativa. Consigliatissimo anche a prezzo pieno per gli amanti del genere. Non fatevelo sfuggire duranti i saldi di Steam. Soldi ben spesi... ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198060520330', 'num_games_owned': 227, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 6382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4146, 'last_played': 1647665890}
review:
Get it if you enjoy tower defense games and diablo playstyle. Even though there are only 15ish maps. There's tiers of those maps along with survival and scenario with plenty of rewards to challenge you. The game itself is like dungeon defenders 1 & 2. however the enemies don't attack your towers (a few bosses do but they only temporarily disable them). So for me this is a great break from it. But because the enemies dont attack your towers. that means you have more micromanagement to deal with the enemies that are going to get through your defenses. 

My complaints on the game are pretty minor and only a few. the music gets pretty repetitive. So you might find yourself turning it off. The controls feel right but every so often I know I hit a hotkey to use an ability but it wont work until I slap it again. Sometimes the enemies will cut corners on a turn making your floor traps ineffective.

Overall i'm enjoying it thoroughly so far and would definitely recommend it to others.

EDIT: I should give fair warning. at tier 3 stage 4 you will encounter a MASSIVE difficulty increase. Other players have been complaining about this issue for over a year now but Neocore refuses to change it. All other maps prior to tier 3 are fun, smooth and gradual difficulty that push you just right. the other maps after tier 3 stage 4 and on feel like "here's a ridiculous challenge now beat it" scenario. You end up cussing at the game more than you have fun. buy deathtrap but only if it's on sale.

Edit2: After not playing it for ~3.5 years and playing through it again. Stage 4 tier 3 is still too difficult. You are given medium level and giant enemies (both of which have lots of hp), you can only play on hard difficulty at tier 3 and you are given very little essence even with all character upgrades that increase starting essence and lower tower costs. There are still players complaining about the difficulty of the stage after all this time. Changing this review to negative due to the developer's unwillingness to fix it. I've also realized that you only get to play about 50% of the game up to this point. Still buy this only if its on sale. Because I am changing it to negative steam is clearing the number of people that have found this review helpful (which is 6 people).

Rather than just complain about the issue here are 3 potential fixes for stage 4 tier 3.

1. Starting essence needs a MASSIVE buff. This is probably the easiest and laziest fix.

2. Heavily cut down on the 1st wave's enemies. Either by removing the giants or halving the total enemies altogether. I think this solution is the most reasonable change. It will allow the stage to be beaten but keep it a challenge.

3. Remove the flying enemy's alternate routes and remove all 4 gates being opened on the first wave. This is probably the least favorable. The issue of there still being too many enemies  and not enough starting essence still exist but at least you don't have to worry about 4 separate directions.

Also some enemies still try to cut corners still making some floor traps useless. This issue still exists ~3.5 years later further justifying this change to a negative review. It makes it feel like abandonware.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002252866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 526, 'playtime_forever': 977, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 977, 'last_played': 1449319057}
review:
タワーディフェンスに、ハクスラ要素を組み合わせたタイトル。

タワーを建設できる位置はマップごとに固定であり、場所ごとに建設できるタワーのカテゴリも指定されている。
従ってタワー同士の連携などといった戦略性は低く、どのタワーから優先して建設するかという選択肢がある程度。

タワーだけで敵を削り切ることも難しく、ゲームとしては自キャラを操作して敵を撃破することが主体となる。

また序盤は、建設できるタワーの種類も少なく単調。
キャンペーンを1周回って、スキルやタワーがアンロックされてからが本番か。

レベル稼ぎやトレハンが非常に重要で、そのあたりのやり込み要素に魅力を感じるプレーヤーならばオススメ。

author: {'steamid': '76561197970404537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 1660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1608795912}
review:
I bought this game a looong time ago when it was in early access and really forgot about it. The premise seemed intriguing. . .  Diablo mixed with Tower Defense. . . two genres I really really like. I wanted to play the full game and set it aside.
Yesterday i was going through my extensive library and saw it was released as finished. I do not have a lot of hours in it yet, but so far I am finiding it pretty fun and addictive. If  Diablo's character progression, loot grind, crafting, and combat. . . mixed with tower defense seems intriguing to you. . .  then pick this title up. Especially if it goes on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010821705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1485804993}
review:
É um jogo Tower Defense muito, muito bom.
 No inicio você escolhe entre três personagens únicos, Sorceress, Maskman e Mercenary, cada um com habilidades totalmente diferentes, uma árvore muito grande de evolução das skill do personagem, com muita, muita opções de diversificação. Tem também a árvore de evolução das skill das armadilhas (trap). O ambiente do jogo é mais escuro, dark, diferente de outros do ramo que tem um gráfico mais colorido (Dungeon Defender). Ao completar cada faze você geralmente ganha pontos para upar as skill do personagem e das traps, ganha grana para comprar itens tipo roupas e acessórios ou drop itens também. Referente a roupas ou acessórios, o seu personagem utiliza igual a qualquer RPG, luvas, botas, cinto, máscara, peitoral, 01 anel, 01 colar e 01 arma em punho. Sempre e bom ter equipamento do mesmo level do seu personagem. 

Prós:
 - 03 personagens distintos.
 - Muitas skill dos personagens.
 - Muitos upgrades para as armadilhas.
 - itens para upar o personagem, armas, peitoral, luvas, potions, etc. 
 - Gráficos muito bons. 
 - Craft de armas e armaduras.
 - Possibilidade de criar fases ou buscar e baixar adicionais grátis pela Oficina Steam.
 - Muitas fases distintas e com a possibilidade de escolher a dificuldade e o modo (Normal, Eternal, rankeada) de jogo em cada.
 - Boss massas.

Contras:
 - As vezes o jogo é muito escuro por ter um clima mais sombrio.
 - Apresenta certa dificuldade para se acostumar com tantas opções.
 - Local pré-definido para colocar as armadilhas em cada fase, ou seja, se em um local está marcado que você pode colocar uma Armadilha Mecânica, você pode colocar qualquer uma mecânica, mas nunca uma mistica. Sem contar que dá muita raiva, as vezes você esta passando apuro, tem grana para colocar 20 armadilhas, mas a fase só tem local para 05. 

De 01 á 10. Nota 08.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031122224', 'num_games_owned': 2686, 'num_reviews': 382, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1448927382}
review:
13 pálya, változó nehézségek, elég sok különböző csapdatípus, 3 választható karakter és sok-sok más egyéb dolog vár rád, ha kipróbálod ezt a játékot.
Nekem egyedül a zsoldos karakter jött be, másik kettő nem igazán nyerte el a tetszésemet.
Tetszett, hogy fel lehetett gyorsítani a játékot, ez jó megoldás volt.
Grafika szép volt, szerencsére semmilyen lassúlást nem észleltem.
Játék kétszer dobott ki, mindkétszer mikor kiegészítőt akartam kraftolni.
Skillrendszer nem rossz, de van egy-két skill mi szerintem totál fölösleges a játékba.
Csapdák fejlesztése se rossz, de rövid időn belül úgy is kialakul benned melyik az a  2-3 csapda amit szívesen használsz, többet úgy se nagyon fogod használni/fejleszteni.
6/10, szívesen ajánlom, kicsit lehetett volna hosszabb is a játék.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002162017', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1579783201}
review: There is a bug which happens almost every turn, yes turn not map which makes your character freeze in place. The only way to reset your character is to get killed. It has ruined so many games for me and my buddy, that I lost count. I also searched the web how to fix this, and I have found topics about it from february and march 2015. Now its 30th November and its still not fixed. Game is good and addictive, but this bug is so gamebreaking that I just cant recommend the game until its fixed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038369707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 9536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8031, 'last_played': 1655249390}
review:
Fun tower defense game you can make community shared maps. Buy it if you like tower defense games for sure! From the world of van helsing. Worth Buying at full price lots of replayability due to the loot system, difficulty tiers, and challenges. Extremely challenging at higher levels causing you to try different combinations of gear traps and studying monsters to take advantage of their weaknesses. Never had any crashes or issues with game graphics are great and music as well.
A very unique game in a league of its own.

9/10 for tower defense genre

author: {'steamid': '76561197993661434', 'num_games_owned': 7148, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 1395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1395, 'last_played': 1444724365}
review:
[H1]In the words of the Verve - "Cause it's a bittersweet symphony.."[/H1]

Which is a very apt description for the feelings I have for the game really, there's a lot going for it, but at the same time, it's an unfinished one. There's places where the game just ... ends. Places where it's clearly unfinished (have a look at the tooltips for the rings for a clear and damning example), and places where it feels like the game was just not quite what it could, and should have been. But before all that, what is Deathtrap?

It's a tower defence game spun off from the very successful Van Helsing series, the series so successful that they've just welded the three parts of the game, frankenstein like into one mammoth lord of the rings style ARPG that will no doubt suck you in and never let you back out again. It's the Path of Exile of offline ARPG's, huge, sprawly, and quite capable of eating thousands of hours of your life.

I do recommend you check out Van Helsing (The ARPG) by the way, it's quite a creation of love by Neocore.

[H1]The somewhat smaller stepchild who gets the hand-me-downs at the developer party.[/H1]

Deathtrap was the spin off of the tower defence, an answer to a bunch of fans who wanted the tower defence part to be it's own game. Thus it went through the trevails of Early Access, got iterated on, and then got released to the public, however, the release copy was... shaky. Let's be kind and call it shaky. Post release support tidied it up some but the overall feeling was that the developers real aim was to work on the Van Helsing series (which was where the real money was), Deathtrap was in the end a side project that whilst nice to have an iron in the fire on, was never going to be the big boy of the family that was being developed. It was the little kid. It was going to get the little toys.

The game plays a lot like the Tower Defence segments in the Van Helsing game, except now you've a set of levels you work through, you've a shop for gearing your choice of class up between levels, and you've a relatively well fleshed out trap selection and talent tree to work with. The good news is that the core game loop plays decently, if a little mechanically, you set down traps, stuff explodes or gets chopped up, and you do your bit, scuttling between the traps and buffing them, and taking an active hand, casting spells or shooting the mobs as you go. 

[H1]The accountants tower defence[/H1]

That said, it genuinely feels more like a numbers game than most TD's, in say - Evil Defenders, there was a real sense of tactical placement and getting the balance of turrets right. In Deathtrap, it's purely about numeric DPS. Do you have the right mix of things that do the right DPS to these mobs? If yes, you win, if no, you lose. There's very little in the way of turrets that really change things up in that sense, they're all variations on the "Enemies die horribly" theme.

The "kink" that Van Helsing has is that the levels as they rise up in difficulty offer unique traps that you can activate and they all have their own thing, the irony is these unique traps -are- the ones that change things up and make things interesting, except you have no real way of influencing them aside from turning them on or off. That's annoying. Again, in other Tower Defence games, such as Sanctuary and Evil Defenders and so on, you had ways of actively tilting the field to your advantage, here, you genuinely are restricted in those tools.

[H1]The news however improves when you add friends.[/H1]

Deathtrap does add one -big- benefit, co-op and versus. Versus is more or less dead. My gaming buddy who I tested this with found that the community for Deathtrap has long since withered away on the vine, we were the only people in the queue, but it did allow us to test the versus mode, and for what it's worth, it's actually really fun, and a criminally underlooked concept. Versus mode Tower Defence could be a really unique take on the genre, one that should be explored more often. 

The Co-op however, that's plain awesome, and a great way to kill several hours with a friend... EXCEPT... it's not finished either. It's unpatched, and Neocore have been too busy with Van Helsing to give it the attention it desperately needs.

[H1]Closing thoughts...[/H1]

My time with Deathtrap has left me humming Bittersweet Symphony, because when it comes to it, that's pretty much a good summary of the game. It's a good game marred by some terrible faults because the developers, probably in their defence rightly, had to focus on the Van Helsing series. It doesn't make this any less of a waste of potential though, which is kind of sad. There's a good co-op tower defence in here, if you make the effort and look past the bugs and the glitches.

Verdict : [b]Get it on a sale, a very deep sale, then have a relaxing evening murdering stuff with a friend.[/b]

[i]Writer and columnist for [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/justreviews]Just Reviews[/url], where you can get similar fine reading material. Join our group, follow our curations, and throw me a like if you would like to keep up to date with our efforts![/i]

review:

Enjoyed the game alot until that level, sadly.

Still, dumped 50+ hours into the game... got my money worth (anything > $1/hr is good).

author: {'steamid': '76561197990267344', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2064, 'last_played': 1498868311}
review:
Pros:
- Addictive.
- Mechanics are good, which is the most important thing in a TD imo.
- Beautiful.
- Somewhat balanced, not too easy, not too hard.
- Satisfying progression.
- Well integrated RPG elements.

Cons:
- Needs some extra balancing (tier 3 level 4??).
- Needs some extra comfort feature, like an informative overview map of your traps where you can also manage them between waves.
But these can easily be addressed in Deathtrap 2 :D (A wish actually...)

9/10 Buy it, it's a pretty good tower defense game with RPG elements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206295723', 'num_games_owned': 7753, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1506180584}
review:
[h1]玩了《DeathTrap》我才知道：原来塔防游戏也可以有这么好的画面，以及这么庞大的体积--10G+
手柄是必需品，造 Trap 和可操控的英雄以抵挡一波又一波的敌人，收集货币和装备，升级技能以变得更强大
这些要素都是塔防游戏常见的，不过这个游戏的每个关卡是可以重复玩的，意味着你可以刷刷刷，nice

至于上一次玩塔防游戏还是NNN年前大学生时代的 魔兽3 自定义地图，在同学的劝诱下，浪费了我好多青春啊 (￣﹏￣；)

不多讲了，这个游戏是 The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing 系列同出自 NeocoreGames
Steam 上这家的游戏我准备全收，另二家要全收的是 DAEDALIC 和 Idea Factory [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197986212983', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1699561706}
review:
Sans doute le meilleur de sa catégorie, très prenant par son ambiance sa pâte graphique punk. Très joli ce jeu, de plus l'aspect rpg et vraiment bien fait, avec un tas d'améliorations possible pour vos héros. la possibilité aussi de créer soi même les cartes de jeu ainsi que les vagues de monstre. 
En parlant de monstre, il y en a pas mal, de simple troupe au troupe élite et les boss, des unités qui de plus sont très bien réalisé. Le jeu a de joli Artworks pour la présentation des unités anisi que pendant le chargement du jeu. un belle réalisation pour un prix vraiment atractif.

On sent la volonté de la devteam, de bien faire les choses et ca, j'apprécie fortement. Un jeu qui pourrait faire rougir les plus grand. Bien sur je le conseille !

author: {'steamid': '76561197993397056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1480784083}
review:
Don't buy it, unless you feel like handing over your money to Neocore out of the goodness of your heart for nothing in return. And let's be honest - if you're considering buying a game called "Deathtrap" your heart probably doesn't have much goodness to spare.

The game has never been playable for me, and in the 5 or 6 months since I bought it not a single update has been released (as far as I can tell). Posts on the support forum go ignored.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014814022', 'num_games_owned': 622, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 8184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8111, 'last_played': 1491219740}
review:
[b][url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/310510] 隠 れ た 名 作 ![/url][/b]

多くの方がとても読みやすい文章で丁寧に書かれているのでそこに甘えつつ、私からは主観的なレビューを書かせて頂きます。


[u]プレイして嬉しかった順[/u]
・マップもタワーもエフェクトも、グラフィックが綺麗で格好良い! 中二心をくすぐります。
　※血がﾌﾞｼｬｰ!! とか、蟲から緑の液体ﾌﾞｼｬｰ!! もあります…(ストアページの動画参照)
・最大4人までマルチで遊べる!
・BGM素敵!

[u]早く直してほしいところ順[/u]
・アップデートはほぼありません! (バグ取りだけでもして!)
　※ゲーム崩壊並みの致命的なバグは私の体験上ありません。
・仕様上とれない実績が確実に1つはあるので、実績取得率100%は現状不可能です。
・BGMの種類が少な過ぎ! (片手で足りる) 良い趣味してるのにもったいない!


マルチプレイおすすめです! スキルの振り方で同じキャラクターでも違いが出てきますし、役割分担すればいろんな種類のタワーを使えます! これぞマルチの醍醐味!!

良いところもそうでないところもありますが私はこのゲーム大好きです!
多くの方に楽しんで頂きたいゲームです!
セールが来たらお友達も誘って、是非プレイしてみて下さい!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971348987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 2924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2528, 'last_played': 1443897081}
review:
Single player only review.

Deathtrap is a really well executed blend of 3rd person action RPG and Tower defense. Like a Diablo clone / 'Orcs must Die" mashup.

There are 3 character classes to choose from, each with their own unique skill tree which unlocks as you gain XP. The classes share the same upgradable traps though, which also unlock as you progress.

Where I found the characters and traps interesting and varied enough, it was a big let down that there is absolutely NO path shaping element in the Tower Defense department. This meant the tactical depth was disappointingly shallow.

There's no noteworthy story, and the voice acting is fairly mediocre, but the graphics and sound effects are good.

Finishing all the campaign maps on tier 1 can be done fairly quickly, but there are 4 tiers and a "Scenario" and "Endless" gamemode, which give the maps replayability. 

Bottom line: it's a fairly generic genre mix that works really well, but doesn't bring anything new to the table in either category.

75%

author: {'steamid': '76561198089719552', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 2442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1294, 'last_played': 1694871191}
review:
Un TD con elementos de rol. Te metes en la piel de una hechicera, un guerrero o un cazador, debiendo ir a una region desolada con el objetivo de evitar que el nuevo Enjambre llegue al mundo real. Montar torretas y atacar personalmente a los monstruos son tus objetivos primarios. Luego, segun el escenario, pueden haber monstruos neutrales que al vencerlos tiran llaves que abren cofres especiales con objetos poderosos.

Una vez avanzado el personaje, tienes la opcion de rejugar los escenarios pasados aumentando la dificultad de ciertas formas. Por supuesto, esto tambien mejora tus recompensas. O jugar tambien el modo infinito, en el que tienes que resistir infinitas oleadas hasta que llegue el inevitable final.

No solo puedes jugar en solitario: puedes unirte a otros en una partida cooperativa, o jugar contra otros, sea como defensor (tu propio personaje haciendo lo habitual) o como atacante (ayudar a los monstruos a alcanzar el portal)

author: {'steamid': '76561198035697433', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1461, 'last_played': 1441336714}
review: Fun for the first 20 hours of gameplay , once I cleared the first round of map and 1/2 2nd It start to seem very repetitive, nothing new.  They try to give you new traps to build but you quickly learn better to have a few good traps than many are lower levels.  I max out the trap with the werewolfs - they are great for slowing enemy and killing them, best trap of all.  So for the price, well worth it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198117612403', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 2044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1980, 'last_played': 1442169461}
review:
Comme la plupart des joueurs, j'ai acheté ce jeu car j'avais aimé dans Van Helsing les phases de tower defense. Et ce jeu s'en inspire directement. Si le système est globalement le même que dans VH, il y a quelques différences et différents ajouts intéréssants. En fait le gameplay en général du jeu est plutôt bon et peut s'avérer amusant. Mais alors pourquoi une évaluation négative ? J'y viens.

Ce jeu est LENT. Mais quand je dis lent, je veux en fait dire EXTREMEMENT LENT. Les ennemis sont lents, votre personnage est lent, l'évolution de vos compétences est lente, les niveaux sont longs. Tout est long dans ce jeu. En fait s'il y avait pas eu un bouton "vitesse x2" dans le jeu, je n'aurais jamais pu le finir. ( D'ailleurs je soupconne les Devs de s'être rendu compte de ce souci trop tard et d'avoir juste rajouté le x2 juste comme ça en vitesse pour boucler le jeu )
J'ai passé tous les niveaux sans exceptions avec la vitesse x2 activée. Je ne revenais à la vitesse normale que quand j'étais sur le point de perdre et qu'il fallait que je gère plusieurs choses à la fois.

Ensuite, si le gameplay est pas mauvais, il n'offre que très peu de choix tactiques.
Le placement des tourelles étant prédéterminé, et comme booster un peu chaque tourelle entre les niveaux vous conduit à la défaite vous finissez par comprendre qu'il vaut mieux se spécialiser dans un seul type de tourelle, et y rester. Et du coup, quelque soit l'ennemi qui arrive, vous mettez toujours ces mêmes tourelles que vous avez améliorés... Sur des placements déterminés... En gros vous servez plus à rien. Aucun choix tactique.
Il suffit de comprendre que le feu est utile contre les hordes, la glace ralentit les ennemis et voilà, le coté tactique est terminé. Un ordi peut le faire à votre place.

Pour finir les défauts, parlons des bugs, il manque des correctifs à ce jeu. Beaucoup de correctifs. Faisons une liste non exhaustive:
- Une fois sur deux, les effets visuels des pouvoirs ne se déclenchent pas
- Les retours Windows instantannés en pleine bataille ( = mort instantané, les ennemis pardonnent pas )
- Les freezes courants
- Persos qui se figent dans le multi ( qui est vide de toute manière )
- Les niveaux qui plantent à répétition. Oui, certains niveaux ne veulent pas se finir. J'ai cherché sur des forums et sur Steam et je ne suis pas le seul. Moi c'est le niveau 10 qui posait problème. Pour lui par exemple c'est le niveau 12:
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198058965598/recommended/310510/
Et il y en a d'autres qui ont ce problème, sur d'autres niveaux. C'est comme au loto: À qui le tour ( de bugger ) ?

En bref j'ai été déçu par ce jeu, et je ne le conseille pas.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971353343', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1444278697}
review:
Don't get me wrong, i like the game but there are way to many bugs that will make you crash to your desktop more than you can stand. 
This game is based upon the tower defence mini game in Van Helsing 1. At certain points (predefined) you can place traps. You gain more traps as you level up and this part of the game is just amazing to play. It plays a little like omd and DD2. The ability to create your own custom maps is highly appreciated, some of the maps made by the community are great and fun to play. The creation of your own map is extremely easy. 
In a sale with more than 50 percent discount you might want to try this game just beware of the crashes that WILL occur.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985223493', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 610, 'last_played': 1540665020}
review: I just finished the campaign.  DeathTrap is a very good tower defense game!  I would recommend it to anybody who loves this genre.  It is better developed then the side-quests (campaigns) in the Van Helsing-games.  So if you like the tower defense quests in the Van Helsing games, you should buy this game with no doubts!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076646200', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2959, 'last_played': 1679480269}
review:
短評：キャンペーンの2週目以降を除けば面白い

現在4週目の途中まで来たところでのレビューです。
おすすめを入れていますが「キャンペーン2週目以降を除いた場合」です。

どこにでもトラップを設置できるタイプではなく、
決まった場所に決まったカテゴリのトラップを置いていくタイプのTDです。
カテゴリ内にそれぞれ5つのトラップ（3つ目以降はアンロックが必要）があり
トラップごとにパッシブ2種・ステージ中に利用できるアップグレード3種を振る形になっているので、
最終的なビルドの自由度は高いです。

キャラクターも近接・射撃・魔法と分かれており
トラップは共通ながら、各キャラクターのスキルが違う為
こちらもビルドの自由度は高いと思います。
（キャラクター・トラップ共にゲーム内マネーでいくらでも振りなおし可）

また、ダンジョンディフェンダーやOrcsMastDie２、Sanctum2をプレイ済みの自分としては大きかったのが
シングルプレイでのみ利用可能なゲーム速度変更機能です。
TDとしては当たり前の機能な気がしますが
がっちりトラップを固めた後に敵の沸きを待つ時間が減るのでスムーズにプレイできました。

順にステージを進めて行くキャンペーン
自分で難易度（縛り）と報酬の調整が可能なシナリオ
延々Waveが続くおなじみのエンドレス
基本的にはステージ毎にこの3種類が用意されており
キャンペーンに関してはEASY～HARDの難易度調整とTier1～4までの周回要素があります。
また、キャンペーンでは難易度とクリア時の拠点ダメージによって
最大☆3つの成績が残るようになっています。
トラップのスキルポイントはこの成績に応じて支払われます。
他にステージによってはサブクエストが設定されており
それをクリアすることでもトラップのスキルポイントがもらえます。
逆に言うとこの2ルートでしかもらえません。

このキャンペーンがクセもので、1週目はとても楽しめる内容ながら
2週目以降のマップデザインが無茶苦茶なステージが多くなってきます。
トラップを置ける場所とカテゴリが決まっている為、
特定のカテゴリのトラップが使えないという制約があったり
ひどい所では手持ちのトラップが一切使えず、
マップに据え置きのトラップのみを使用してクリアしなければいけない所もあります。

この時点でせっかくのトラップビルドの自由度が台無しになってしまいました。
キャラクターのビルドが強く影響する為、ビルドによっては詰むと思います。

シナリオやエンドレスは個人的には十分楽しめているので
キャンペーンのマップデザインだけどうにかなれば・・・という所です。

トレハン要素については最上位アイテムが出た時の嬉しさはありますが
最上位アイテムのみ10段階までアップグレード可能な為
2つ目以降の同種アイテムに関しては若干トーンが落ち目になる可能性も。

雰囲気・音楽については好みな方です。
ダーク・スチームパンクという言葉にピンと来る方は気に入るのではないでしょうか。

良ゲーとすべき点はたくさんあるので
2週目以降のマップデザインに苦を感じない方であれば
定価でも損はしないと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198012103986', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 27034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14375, 'last_played': 1707603353}

My Final Verdict Is That Neocore can't Be trusted. They Make Games that have amazing potential in regards to being a mix between a chalenge and looking fairly odd in general.(This is the Positive note)  Sadly based on my own observations and information from other reviews on other games created by Neocore The Truth is Neocore's ability TO maintain any of there games is the dull edge of a double edged sword. The Sharp Edge Is That there games have amazing potential. I Just Wish that we could see Neocore Make use of that potential or sell The Deathtrap IP to a company that will treat it with more respect then Neocore has. Neocore to me is just anouther wanabe Giant that fell on it's ass. If  Neocore someday Does A much better job at making sure there games work properly neer or at release then i might recomend them but not today. To bad to i realy do like there games but Neocore is just varry unprofesional in regards to maitinance and handling inquaries in regards to there games. author: {'steamid': '76561198108920650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 5919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2452, 'last_played': 1632013176}
review:
I want to start off saying this is a great game. This is as if someone made diablo into a tower defense and did it well.
Three classes to choose from but with the unlockable abilities it can make many unique playstyles. The merc will probably be the easiest to start off with as you can jump into any fight. Otherwise for the marksman and sorceress, the shift key will be your friend. I do not know what the multiplayer is like, but the two current types look very interesting. The traps are very unique so finding the right combination for the right round may be a challenge, but you can see where things will spawn. It is not usually too difficult as trial and error or too grinding for better gear. The unlocking of new abilities and traps is actually interesting especially testing them out and getting a feel for them. The trap tier unlocks feel a little strange though, but it is not that big of an issue.

This game could use some work. Not saying it is bad, but it could be better. Especially the higher tiers and levels where the game just starts getting ridiculous with trying to find new ways to become harder. Not always, but sometimes it feels quite cheap when an enemy decides to change its behavior and slowly walk to the goal ignoring you despite having taken out three or four before it and all of them before it. Tier 1 on hard for the last level is a pain especially with the possibility of crashing once the boss does a time distort when you nearly defeat it. For me having started going hard only since halfway through tier 1 makes it a fair challenge. The side quests are interesting and challenging especially with a tank character on a quest to not do any damage at all with your character. Those are fine. This game is really worth it, but another thing that can make your game crash are those flashing red pathways and those annoying overhead objects. The overhead objects also feel like a bit much because no one wants an archway to flash on your screen.
So three things that could make this game better are: 
Make it so the game does not crash as easily,
an option to turn off those overhead objects and flashing pathways (or at least a more optimal alternative),
and keeping the enemy behavior consistent based on what it is. Otherwise the player will be confused why the fourth slicer decided to just keep walking through the player. Unless this is super-next-gen and he saw what happened to his friends and tried something new.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989243222', 'num_games_owned': 2201, 'num_reviews': 301, 'playtime_forever': 1833, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1449, 'last_played': 1584896199}
review:
Elsősorban azoknak ajánlott, akik szeretik a tower defense gémeket, de valami újabbra vágynak. Nos Láttuk a Sanctumot, ahogy fps-sel vegyítette, most azonban jó kis felülnézetes rpgvel mixelték a stílust.

Nézzük a tower részét:
A towerek teszik a dolgukat, lövik az enemit, igazából nincs semmi újítás a téren. Azonban mint ahogy a játék neve is mutatja, lehet rakni csapdákat is. Minden csapdának megvan a különlegessége, legyen az vérfarkasokat kiszabadító csapda, vagy esetleg egyszerű tüske. Máshogy, és más mértékben sebzi vagy lassítja őket...ééééés ettől függően kell megválasztanunk csapdáink és karakterünk képességeit is. Hiszen ha karakterünk egy fagyott enemire nagyobb sebzést tud adni, akkor fagyi csapdát pakolunk a földre, ez egyértelmű. Azonban a mapokon mindig más helyen helyezkednek el a csapdák helyei, és nem lehet csak úgy random placcra letelepíteni egy vérfarkas hordát. Minden típusnak megvan a saját helye, ami megnehezítheti dolgunkat. Emiatt azt tudom mondani, hogy legalább egy haverral kell játszani, mert így mindkettőtök egy másik karakterre tud specializálódni, így el lehet sütni egy másik képességet, ha a sajátod nem ment. Van egy olyan huszon néhány map, amelyeket végig tudtok tolni 5x, és minden végigjátszásnál nehezedik, valamint egyre kevesebb helyre lehet pakolni. A nehezedést nem éreztem elég egyenletesnek, mert van hogy egy nagyon könnyű map után jön egy extrém helyzet amivel hirtelen nem is tudunk mit kezdeni, ki kell tapasztalni.

Az rpg rész:
Sajnálom, hogy csak 3 class került be a játékba. A játékról tudni kell, hogy a Van Helsing rpg sorozat fejlesztői készítették, amibe nagyon kreatív classokat raktak. Szerintem elfért volna még egyszer ennyi. Képesség terén viszont nincs hiány. Lehet mind aktív, mind passzív képességeket is fejleszteni. Legyen az dmg orientált, vagy tower segítő, esetleg olcsóbb tower ár. A képességek függetlenek egymástól, így arra fejlesztünk amire jól esik, persze kell egy bizonyos szint, hogy magát a lehetőséget unlockoljuk. Még így is gyorsabbnak találtam egy rendes lassú rpg ágrajzhoz képest. Egyébként pénzösszegért újra rakhatjuk az össze képesség pontot.

A játék maga szép, és tetszetős a stílusa, de egy némelyik pálya elég siralmasan néz ki, főleg ha már a sokadik végigjátszást tolja az ember. Ami viszont határozottan nem tetszett, az a matchmaking része. Rendben van, hogy szomszéd pistikével tolod és körülbelül egyszerre fejlődtök, azonban ha véletlen betalálsz egy lobbyba (ha egyáltalán betalálsz), onnan biztos hogy kidobnak, mert a leveled túl kicsi lesz ahhoz a pályához. Másik, hogy valami el van baszarintva a matchmaking keresésben: vagy nagyon kevesen játszanak vele, vagy nincs ideje az embereknek várni, vagy egy sor kód kimaradt a játékból. Minden esetre ne számítsunk arra, hogy ismi nélkül tudunk játszani.

Végeredményben, én meg vagyok vele elégedve, főleg, hogy még pályaszerkesztőt is kapott workshop supporttal, viszont a sután korlátolt lobby rendszer miatt csak egy 8/10 gulyást kap.
